name: Abacaxi Ricaço
garnish: Cut a straw sized hole in the top of the pineapple shell & replace it as a lid
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Pineapple shell (frozen) glass
ingredients: ['1 whole Pineapple (fresh)', '3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot White caster sugar']
steps: Cut the top off a small pineapple and carefully scoop out the flesh from the base to leave a shell with 12mm (½ inch) thick walls. Place the shell in a freezer to chill. Remove the hard core from the pineapple flesh and discard; roughly chop the remaining flesh, add other ingredients and BLEND with one 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into the pineapple shell and serve with straws. (The flesh of one pineapple blended with the following ingredients will fill at least two shells).

name: Abbey
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: A.B.C. Cocktail
garnish: Lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Tawny port', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: TEAR mint and place in shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Absinthe Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 1⁄2 shot Chilled water', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Absinthe Frappé

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) and serve with a straw.

Serve in an Old-fashioned glass

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

FLOAT cream on the surface of the drink by pouring over the back of a spoon and swirl to form a thin layer. Depending on the sweetness of your blackberries, you may need to add a touch of sugar syrup.

name: Berry Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 fresh Blackberries', '3 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '1 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add mixed berries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

POUR pale ale or lager into chilled glass then carefully FLOAT Guinness on top.
Layering can be aided by pouring down the stout/porter down the shaft of a bar spoon so that the flat end dissipates the falling porter/stout. Or, an upturned tablespoon or a purpose-made black-and-tan may be used. This is bent in the middle of the handle so that it can be secured on the edge of a pint glass.

name: Blue Blazer
ingredients: ["4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '4 shot Boiling water', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)']
steps:
You will need a pair of large silver-plated tankards (blazer mugs) with handles. Preheat these with boiling water and warm the whisky. POUR the whisky into one tankard and fresh boiling water into the other. Ignite the whisky using a long match and while still blazing pour the whisky into the other tankard. Then mix ingredients by pouring them from one tankard to the other. The foolhardy increase the distance between the tankards as they pour, thus creating a spectacular long blue flame between the two. Extinguish flame by covering flaming tankard with base of the other tankard, pour into glass and sweeten to taste by stirring in powdered sugar.

WARNING - please practice with water first to perfect your method. Stand on a non-flammable floor and have suitable fire-fighting equipment nearby. The following recipe makes two drinks.

name: Blue Heaven

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Blue Kamikaze
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Lady
garnish: Express coin-sized orange zest twist and float in the centre of cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe Gold 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Lagoon
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass and STIR. Fill glass with ice and TOP with lemon-lime soda.

name: Blue Margarita
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: Blue Monday
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Moon Cocktail (1940's recipe)
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Passion
ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. If serving over cubed ice use this recipe: 1½ light white rum, ¾ blue curaçao, ¾ lime juice and ½ sugar syrup.

name: Blue Riband
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Star
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Velvet Margarita
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Wave
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Blueberry Daiquiri
ingredients: ['20 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Myrtille liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blueberry Martini
ingredients: ['8 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Myrtille liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blueberry Cocktail
ingredients: ['24 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3⁄4 shot Sauvignon blanc wine']
steps: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blueberry Tea
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', 'Top up with Breakfast tea (hot)']
steps: POUR first two ingredients into glass, top up with tea and stir.

name: Blush Martini
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blushin' Russian
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bobby Burns cocktail (Craddock's recipe)
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & a slice of shortbread
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bohemian Iced Tea
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Krupnik spiced honey liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2 1⁄2 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Boilermaker
ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 pint Budweiser Budvar']
steps: POUR whiskey to brim of shot glass and then manoeuvre shot glass so it is held tight up against the inside base of an upturned Boston glass. Then quickly flip the Boston glass over so that the bourbon is trapped in the now upside-down shot glass. Now pour beer into Boston glass over the whiskey filled shot glass.

name: Bolero
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bolero Sour

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into an ice-filled glass.

name: Bolshoi Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '1 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Bombay No. 2

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer, stir and serve with straws.

name: Bon Bon
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Bon Bon sweets

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Boomerang
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bora Bora Brew (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Borderline

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bosom Caresser

name: Bossa Nova #1

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Bossa Nova #2

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Boston
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Boston Flip
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2 shot Rainwater/Verdelho med-dry madeira', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Boston Tea Party
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca Cola & Pepsi Cola)']
steps: SHAKE first ten ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola and serve with straws.

name: Bourbon Blush
ingredients: ['3 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Creme de Framboise', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup']
steps: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bourbon Cookie
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄2 shot Butterscotch liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2 1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', "4 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Bourbon Smash
ingredients: ['12 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '4 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Bourbonella
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bradford Martini
garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Brainstorm
ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bramble
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Top with more crushed ice and compact ice to form a volcano-shaped mound. DRIZZLE liqueur over this mound to create a 'bleeding' effect in the glass. Serve with short sustainable straws.

name: Bramblette
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Brandy Alexander
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '5⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Brandy Blazer
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 shot Boiling water', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: POUR cognac into a warmed glass and rest the bowl of the glass on an old-fashioned glass so it lies on its side supported by the rim. FLAME the cognac and carefully move the glass back to an upright position sitting normally on your work surface. POUR in hot water (this will extinguish any remaining flame) and sugar. Stir, garnish and serve.

name: Brandy Buck
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale and serve with straws.

name: Brandy Crusta
garnish: Some merely shove a wide long piece of lemon peel around the inside of the glass rim, leaving the drinker to push the peel down into the glass in order to sip from the drink. Instead I prefer the peel to become a watertight extension to the glass. Find a lemon which fits snugly in the top of a small wine, flute or sour glass. Cut off both ends of the fruit and carefully remove the pulp to leave a barrel-shaped shell of skin. Place in the top of the glass. Wet the edge of the glass and exposed fruit shell with sugar syrup and dip in caster sugar to frost the edge of both peel and glass. Leave for a couple of hours to form a hard crust that helps secure the peel.
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-prepared glass.

name: Brandy Fix
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Brandy Fizz
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Fizz or Highball (8oz to 10oz)
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with soda.

name: Brandy Flip
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Brandy Milk Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 5⁄6 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Don't dry shake a Milk Punch as this produces something redolent of an Egg Nog.)

name: Brandy Smash
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in a Libbey Old Fashioned 11oz
ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

name: Brandy Sour
garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Brazen Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Brazilian Berry
ingredients: ['4 fresh Blackcurrants', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
steps: MUDDLE fruit in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: Brazilian Coffee
ingredients: ['1 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

name: Brazilian Monk

steps: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

name: Breakfast At Terrell's
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Breakfast Martini
garnish: Orange zest twist & slice of toast on rim
ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker until it dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Brighton Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Broadmoor cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bronx
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Brooklyn (St George version)
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Brooklyn Godfather
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Brubaker Old-fashioned
ingredients: ['2 spoon Malt extract', "2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR malt extract in glass with Scotch until malt extract dissolves. Add ice and one shot of Scotch and stir. Add remaining Scotch, sugar and Angostura and stir some more. Add more ice and keep stirring so that ice dilutes the drink.

name: Bubblegum Shot
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']

name: Bulldog

name: Bullfrog #1

name: Bull's Blood

name: Bull's Milk

name: Bumble Bee

steps: POUR tequila into chilled glass and then drop Tabasco over the top. This will sink through the tequila.

name: Burnt Toasted Almond

name: Butterfly's Kiss
ingredients: ['2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Cinnamon schnapps & Goldwasser liqueurs', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']

name: Butterscotch Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']

name: Butterscotch Delight
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Irish cream liqueur']
steps: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

name: Butterscotch Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Buzzard's Breath
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', "1 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

name: Byzantine
ingredients: ['6 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime & lemongrass cordial', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients apart from tonic water, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

name: C C Kazi
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cable Car
garnish: Cinnamon & sugar rim & orange zest twist (discarded)
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Martini glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Martini 5.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Spiced rum', '3⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cachaça Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cactus Banger
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cactus Jack
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Café Gates
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', 'Top up with Filter coffee (hot)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: Place bar spoon in glass, POUR first three ingredients and top up with coffee, then float cream by pouring over the back of a spoon.

name: Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut a ripe lime in half (from pole to pole) and remove the core from each half by cutting a cut a v-shaped grove. You'll need one-half of the lime per drink and this should be chopped into wedges and each wedge chopped in half before dropping the resulting 6 or 8 lime chunks into the base tin of a shaker.

2. Add 3 bar spoons powdered sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. If using cubed ice straight from the freezer, add chilled water (or optionally add fruit of choice) and MUDDLE some more. If using watery ice then omit some or all of the water/juice.

4. When sure the limes's juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, POUR the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the shaker tin used to muddle and swirl to rinse tin before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to mix with other ingredients.

6. If using cubed ice, crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

name: Caipirissima
ingredients: ['3⁄4 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils in its skin. Add rum and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

name: Caipirovska
ingredients: ['3⁄4 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils in its skin. Add vodka and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

name: Caipiruva
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '4 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
steps: MUDDLE lime wedges and grapes in base of shaker to release juices. Add cachaça and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

name: Cajun Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Pepper flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR vermouth with ice. Strain, discarding vermouth to leave only a coating on the ice. Pour pepper vodka into mixing glass, stir with coated ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Chocolate Puff

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Chocolate Sazerac
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: Fill glass with ice, POUR in absinthe, top up with water and leave the mixture to stand in the glass. Separately STIR bourbon, cacao, sugar and bitters with ice. Finally discard contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and strain contents of shaker into empty absinthe-coated glass.

name: Absinthe Drip Cocktail (French method)
serving_suggestion: Serve in an Absinthe glass or old-fashioned glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 shot Chilled water', '1 cube Sugar cube']
steps: POUR absinthe into glass. PLACE cube of sugar on a slotted absinthe spoon resting across the top of the glass. Using an absinthe fountain (or a bottle of chilled mineral water with a small hole in the cap), DRIP iced water over the sugar so it dissolves and drips into the glass. Traditionally the same amount of water is added as absinthe, but full-strength absinthe requires more dilution - Keep dripping until absinthe louches (turns milky white). Add ice, stir and serve.

name: Absinthe Drip Cocktail (Czech method)
serving_suggestion: Serve in an Absinthe glass or old-fashioned glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 shot Chilled water', '1 cube White caster sugar']
steps: PLACE sugar cube on a slotted absinthe spoon resting across the top of the glass. POUR the absinthe over the sugar cube into the glass. LIGHT the absinthe soaked cube and leave to burn and caramelise. Using a bottle of chilled mineral water with a small hole in the cap, DRIP water over what's left of the sugar so it dissolves and drips into the glass. Add ice, stir and serve.

name: Absinthe Italiano Cocktail

steps: SHAKE all the ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: American Beauty (by Trader Vic)

steps: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Use the back of a soup spoon to FLOAT port over drink.

name: Amsterdam Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Angel Face
garnish: Orange zest twist, or apple wedge on rim, or float (dehydrated) apple slice
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Fizzio 1920 Coupe 9oz
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.

name: Angel's Share No.1
ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: STIR heaped spoon of orange marmalade with cognac in base of shaker until marmalade dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Angel's Share No.2
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Nocello walnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port']
steps: POUR the Chartreuse into glass and coat the inside of the glass with the liqueur by tilting and rotating it. DISCARD excess liqueur. Carefully set the liqueur on the inside of the glass alight and allow it to BURN for a few seconds. Extinguish flame by placing a saucer over the glass, add other ingredients and SWIRL to mix. Beware of hot glass rim.

name: Ante
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bourbon Crusta
garnish: Find a lemon which fits into a small wineglass tightly enough to act as a watertight extension to the glass. Cut off both ends of the fruit and carefully remove the pulp to leave a barrel-shaped shell of skin. Place in the top of the glass. Wet the edge of the glass and exposed fruit shell with sugar syrup and dip in caster sugar to frost the edge of both peel and glass. Leave for a couple of hours to form a hard crust.
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']

steps:
Cut zest from your lime for garnish prior to squeezing for juice. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

For an even better Daiquiri use 2 x 5ml measuring spoons of powdered sugar (finely ground caster sugar) in place of 10ml sugar syrup. Stir sugar with other ingredients in base of shaker prior to adding ice and shaking to ensure fully dissolved.

name: Dry Martini 'Preferred Stirred' (5:1 ratio)
garnish: Chilled skewered olive or lemon zest twist (or served Dicken's-style without a garnish)
ingredients: ['2 1⁄12 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Dry Martini - The 'Naked' or 'Direct' Martini
garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Chilled water', '1⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin']
steps:
1. Place glass and bottle of gin in freezer for at least two hours before making drink.
2. An hour before making drink POUR water into frozen glass, swirl around to coat and place back in freezer. Preferably do this with a little of the water at a time. Continue to swill around during freeing process to coat the sides of the glass.
3. When ready to serve drink, POUR chilled vermouth into icy glass and swirl to coat with vermouth.
4. POUR frozen gin into glass, garnish and serve immediately.

1. Infuse gin with black tea (preferably Earl Grey) for 5 minutes and then strain to remove tea and prevent over infusion.
2. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Fizz (generic name)
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Fizz or Highball (8oz to 10oz)
ingredients: ['2 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', '1 shot Freshly squeezed lemon or lime juice', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (optional)', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass). TOP with soda (ideally dispensed from a siphon).

name: Flaming Dr Pepper
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Boston & shot glass
ingredients: ['1 pint Budweiser Budvar', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot White overproof rum']
steps: POUR beer into Boston glass. Layer amaretto and rum in chilled shot glass by carefully pouring amaretto and then rum. IGNITE the rum and carefully lift shot glass then drop (bottom first) into Boston glass.

name: Flaming Ferrari
garnish: Assistant to help the drinker consume the concoction
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)']
steps:
Step 1: LAYER the first four ingredients by carefully pouring in order into a Martini glass.
Step 2: In two shot glasses POUR the remaining two ingredients separately.
Step 3: IGNITE the contents of the Martini glass. Give two long straws to the drinker and instruct them to drink the contents of the Martini glass in one go. As they do so, slowly POUR the contents of the two shot glasses into the flaming Martini glass.

name: Flaming Henry
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey']
steps: LAYER by carefully pouring ingredients in the order below. IGNITE bourbon. Extinguish flame prior to drinking and beware of hot glass rim.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Flatliner
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Luxardo Sambuca', '3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
steps: POUR sambuca into chilled glass. LAYER tequila by carefully pouring over sambuca. Lastly DRIP pepper sauce onto drink. This will sink through the tequila to form an orange line on top of the sambuca.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fourth of July Cocktail

steps: POUR bourbon and Galliano into warm glass, IGNITE and sprinkle cinnamon while flaming. SHAKE last three ingredients with ice and strain into glass over extinguished bourbon and Galliano base.

name: Fourth of July Shot
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka']
steps: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

name: Frankenjack Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Dry Martini (15:5 dumped) Franklin
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR vermouth with ice and strain to DISCARD excess, leaving the glass and ice-coated with vermouth. POUR gin over vermouth coated ice, STIR and strain into chilled glass.

name: Freddy Fudpucker
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
steps: STIR tequila and orange juice with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Float Galliano.

name: Free Town

name: French 75 Cocktail
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add gin, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir. (Consider pouring half the champagne into the glass first to help reduce foaming.)

name: French 76
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']

steps: Squeeze orange juice using pillar or elbow press and fine strain to remove any flesh. Then blend the freshly squeezed juice at high speed (without ice) to make "fluffy". Pour Campari, sugar syrup and half of the orange juice into glass over 2 cubes of ice and STIR. Fill glass with more ice (3 cubes) and fill with rest of fluffy orange juice.

ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Gina
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR all ingredients into chilled glass, add ice and briefly stir.

name: Ginger & Lemongrass Martini
ingredients: ['1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1⁄2 fresh Lemongrass stem', '2 spoon Honey', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Apple juice', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water']
steps: MUDDLE ginger and lemongrass in base of shaker. Add other ingredients and STIR until honey dissolves. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gin-Ger & Tonic
ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker, add gin and sugar, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

name: Ginger Cosmo
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Coupe 8.5oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Ginger sugar syrup', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 drop Bob's Ginger Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Ginger Cosmos
ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '5 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE ginger and basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve with straws.

name: Ginger Margarita
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', "4 drop Bob's Ginger Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Ginger Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Green ginger wine', '3⁄4 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Ginger Mojito
ingredients: ['3 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add mint and lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise). Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with ginger ale.

name: Ginger Nut
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Hazelnut liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Ginger Punch

steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add honey and rum and STIR until honey is dissolved. Add lime juice and sugar, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

name: Gin-Ger Tom

steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gingertini

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda.

steps: BLEND all ingredients with a 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with straws.

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Grand Cosmopolitan

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: POUR half the champagne into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice), then the orange juice, orange liqueur and then the rest of the champagne.

name: Grand Sazerac
ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', 'Top up with Chilled water', '1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass and TOP with water. Leave the mixture to stand in the glass. Separately, STIR other ingredients with ice. Finally, discard contents of absinthe-washed glass and strain contents of shaker into absinthe-washed glass. (No ice in the finished drink.)

name: Grand Sidecar

ingredients: ['2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']

name: Gusto
ingredients: ['7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Agavero liqueur', '2 shot Apple juice']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Gypsy Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '10 dried Raisins', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)']
steps: MUDDLE rosemary and raisins in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Juicy Gypsy
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hair of the Dog
ingredients: ['3 spoon Honey', "2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: STIR honey with Scotch until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hakkatini
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Apple juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hammer of the Gods
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Boston & shot glass
ingredients: ['1 shot Tuaca liqueur', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: LAYER ingredients by carefully pouring into shot glass in the following order. IGNITE and hold pint glass upside down a few inches above the flame. Allow the drink to burn for thirty seconds or so before killing the flame, being sure to keep the pint glass in place. Instruct your subject to suck the alcohol vapour from the inverted pint glass using a bendy straw. Finally, remove the pint glass and let your subject consume the drink through the straw.

name: Hanky Panky Cocktail
garnish: Orange zest twist (go easy - orange oils add unwanted bitterness if overdone)
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄24 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed) (optional)', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt) (optional)"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Happy New Year
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Tawny port', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Hard Lemonade
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and serve with straws.

name: The Harlem
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']

steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with a splash of soda.

Serve in a Coupe glass

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink using a bar spoon. Top the glass with more crushed ice so as to fill it and churn again. Serve with straws.

Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Coupe 8.5oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

If using honey rather than pre-diluted honey syrup, then STIR 3 spoons of runny honey with citrus juices in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add the rum, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Irish Coffee
garnish: Dust with freshly grated nutmeg and/or float 3 coffee beans
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Toddy glass
Photographed in a Libbey Irish Coffee 6oz
ingredients: ['1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 shot Filter coffee (hot)', '1 shot Double cream / heavy cream']
steps:
1. Select a heat-proof glass and pre-warm by filling with very hot water and leave to stand.
2. Separately prepare cream by lightly warming and whipping or shaking (ideally use a milk frother to whip your cream).
3. Empty the now warmed glass.
4. POUR whiskey, sugar syrup and hot coffee into pre-warmed glass and briefly stir.
5. FLOAT heated and aerated cream over the back of a warmed spoon.

name: Julep (Generic Name)

steps: Lightly MUDDLE mint leaves with spirit in base of shaker (just enough to bruise). (At this stage, if time allows, you should refrigerate the shaker, mint and spirit, and the glass in which the drink is to be served, for at least two hours.) Add other ingredients to shaker, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top with more crushed ice to fill glass and churn again. Serve with straws.

serving_suggestion: Serve in a Cartridge mug or Collins glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot White overproof rum', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled (cubed ice) tiki mug (or large Collins glass). Top with crushed ice and then top with prosecco.

name: Karamel Sutra Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Tuaca liqueur', '1 shot Toffee liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Katinka
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Kava
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Kee-Wee Martini
ingredients: ['1 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Cut kiwi fruit in half, scoop out flesh into base of shaker and MUDDLE. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Kentucky Colonel
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Peach purée', '1⁄4 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Kentucky Dream
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Apple juice']
steps: STIR vanilla liqueur and bitters with two ice cubes in a glass. Add half the bourbon and two more ice cubes. Stir some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the bourbon. Add the last two ingredients and more ice cubes and stir lots more. The melting and stirring of the ice cubes is essential to the dilution and taste of the drink.

name: Kentucky Jewel
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Kentucky Mac
ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Ginger liqueur', '2 shot Apple juice']
steps: MUDDLE ginger and mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Kentucky Muffin
ingredients: ['12 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve with straws.

name: Kentucky Pear
ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Pear & cognac liqueur', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1 shot Apple juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Kentucky Tea
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

name: Key Lime
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Lime flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
steps: BLEND all ingredients without ice and serve.

name: Key Lime Pie #1
ingredients: ['2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass. SHAKE cream and Licor 43 without ice so as to mix and whip. FLOAT cream mix on surface of drink.

name: Key Lime Pie #2
ingredients: ['2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
steps: Shake all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass. To make the pie rim, wipe outside edge of rim with cream mix and dip into crunched up Graham Cracker or digestive biscuits.

name: Key Lime Pie #3
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: K.G.B.

steps: LAYER in glass by pouring carefully in the following order.

name: Killer Punch

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Kir Aperitif

steps: POUR half the chilled wine into chilled glass. POUR cassis into glass and TOP with rest of the chilled wine.

name: Kir Cocktail

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Kir Royale Cocktail
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '4 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: POUR cassis into glass and TOP with champagne.

name: Kiss of Death
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Luxardo Sambuca', "3⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
steps: Take sambuca from freezer and Galliano from refrigerator then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

steps: Cut kiwi in half and scoop flesh into blender. Add other ingredients and BLEND with 18oz scoop crushed ice until smooth. Serve with straws.

steps: Cut kiwi in half, scoop out flesh into base of shaker and MUDDLE. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

name: Lemon Meringue Pie'tini
garnish: Pie rim - wipe outside edge of rim with cream mix and dip into crunched up Graham Cracker or digestive biscuits.
ingredients: ['1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled and rimmed glass. DRY SHAKE cream and liqueur (without ice) so as to mix and whip. FLOAT cream & liqueur mix by pouring over back of spoon.

name: Lemon Sorbet
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Chilled water', '1 cupful White caster sugar', '1⁄2 cupful Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5 fresh Lemon peel', '1⁄4 cupful Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2 spoon Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: Heat water in pan and add sugar. Simmer and stir until sugar dissolves, add lemon juice and grated lemon rind and continue to simmer and stir for a few minutes. Take off the heat and allow to cool. Fine strain into a shallow container and stir in liqueur and orange bitters. Beat egg whites and fold into mix. Place in freezer and store for up to 3-4 days before use.

name: Lemony
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']

name: Lemongrad

steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic and briefly stir.
