name: Margarita with Salt Foam Float
ingredients: ['4 spoon Salt', '1 pint Chilled water', '3 shot Pasteurised egg white', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)']
steps: Combine first three ingredients, POUR into cream whipping siphon and CHARGE with nitrous oxide. Shake and place siphon in a refrigerator for one hour prior to making drink. SHAKE next three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. SQUIRT salt foam over surface of drink from siphon.

name: Marguerite Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄24 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Maria Theresa Margarita
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup']
steps: STIR honey with tequila in base of shaker to dissolve honey. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Marmalade Cocktail
ingredients: ['4 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker so as to dissolve marmalade. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Marmarita
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Marny Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR (or shake) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Marquee
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Martinez
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Martini Royale
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR vodka and crème de cassis with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with chilled champagne.

name: Martini Special
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄24 shot Orange flower/blossom water', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: 'Martini' Thyme
ingredients: ['2 sprig Lemon thyme (remove stalks)', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE thyme in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mary Pickford Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Coley Coupe Gold 6oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mary Queen of Scots
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB 1910 Old Fashioned 10.5oz
ingredients: ["1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Drambuie liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Mary Rose
ingredients: ['1 fresh Rosemary sprig', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: MUDDLE rosemary in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Maurice Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mat the Rat
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Matador No.1
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Mauresque
ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '4 shot Chilled water']
steps: POUR absinthe and almond syrup into glass. Ideally, serve iced water separately in a small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste. Lastly, add ice to fill the glass.

name: Mayan
garnish: Pineapple wedge on rim &/or float 3 coffee beans
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Mayan Whore
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, DO NOT STIR and serve with straws.

name: Mayfair Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 dried Clove', '1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE clove in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Maxim's Coffee (Hot)
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", 'Top up with Filter coffee (hot)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into warmed glass and STIR.

name: Medicinal Solution
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Medium Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass

name: Melon Ball Shot
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Melon Collie Martini
ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Milk (semi-skimmed/2% fat)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Melon Daiquiri #1 (served 'up')
ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Melon Daiquiri (served frozen)
ingredients: ['1 segment Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and place in blender. Add other ingredients and BLEND with half scoop of crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: Melon Margarita #1 (served 'up')
ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Melon Margarita #2 (served frozen)
ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and place in blender. Add other ingredients and BLEND with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: Melon Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Melon Martini (fresh fruit)
ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Cut melon into eight segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Meloncholy Martini
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mellow Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Menehune Juice
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: Merry Widow(er)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Merry Widow #2
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Mesa Fresca
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Met Manhattan
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe Gold 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Metropolitan
ingredients: ['1 shot Blackcurrant flavoured vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Merry-Go-Round Martini
garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mexican
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mexican 55
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Mexican Coffee (Hot)
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Filter coffee (hot)', 'Float lightly whipped Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: Place bar spoon in glass. POUR first three ingredients into glass and stir. FLOAT cream.

name: Mexican Manhattan
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "1 dash Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Mexican Martini (Añejo Margarita)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mexican Melon Ball
ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Cut melon into eight segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Mexican Mule
garnish: Lime slice, mint sprigs bouquet. Serve with paper straw
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Copper mug or Collins glass
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: POUR first 3 ingredients into mug/glass & stir and briefly stir. Two-thirds fill glass with cubed ice. TOP with ginger beer and fill glass with a crown of crushed ice.

name: Mexican Surfer
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mexican Tea (Hot)
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Breakfast tea (hot)']
steps: Place bar spoon in warmed glass. POUR all ingredients into glass and stir.

name: Mexico City
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mexicano (Hot)
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', 'Top up with Filter coffee (hot)', 'Float lightly whipped Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: POUR tequila and liqueur into warmed glass and top with coffee. FLOAT cream over drink.

name: Miami Beach
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Miami Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Michelada
garnish: Coarse sea salt rim - salt the rim of a chilled beer mug by rubbing it with a lime wedge and dipping rim in the coarse salt. Save the lime wedge to squeeze over and drop into finished drink.
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Collins glass
Photographed in a Libbey Trigger Tankard
ingredients: ['5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)', '1⁄6 shot Worcestershire sauce', 'Top up with Dunkel / dark / black lager']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.

name: Milano Sour
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "1 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Milk & Honey Cocktail
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3 spoon Honey', '1⁄2 shot Krupnik spiced honey liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot Milk (semi-skimmed/2% fat)']
steps: STIR Scotch with honey in base of shaker to dissolve honey. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Milk Punch
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2 1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Milky Mojito
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Pernod anise', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in glass. Fill glass with crushed ice, add other ingredients. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.

name: Million Dollar Cocktail
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & pineapple wedge on rim
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Million Dollar Margarita
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters (optional)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Millionaire
garnish: Dust with freshly grated nutmeg & optional small orange wedge on rim
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe Gold 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Millionaire No.1
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe 1920 7.75oz
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Overproof pot still rum', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Milly Martini
ingredients: ['5 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE basil (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mimosa
ingredients: ['3 shot Brut Champagne (chilled)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed) (chilled)']
steps: POUR half the champagne into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice), then POUR orange juice and finally the rest of the champagne.

name: Milano
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Mint Cocktail
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (There's no need to muddle mint if a good shake and ice is used.)

name: Mint Collins
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Mint Daiquiri
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mint Fizz
ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients apart from soda, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Mint Julep Cocktail
garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet dusted with icing sugar
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into julep cup half-filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top up the cup with more crushed ice and CHURN again. Repeat this process so the drink fills the cup and frost forms on the outside.

name: Mint Limeade (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Apple juice', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Mint Martini
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Miss Martini
ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Missionary's Downfall
ingredients: ['15 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE mint with rum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Mississippi Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Mississippi Schnapper
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mister Stu
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄3 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Mocha Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']

name: Modernista

name: Mojito Cocktail

steps: ADD first 4 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice. TOP with splash of soda, briefly stir and serve.

name: Mojito de Casa
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: La Momie

steps: POUR pastis into chilled glass and top with chilled water.

name: Momisette

steps: POUR pastis and almond syrup into glass. Serve with bottle of sparkling water so the customer can dilute to their own taste. (I recommend five shots.) Lastly, add ice to fill glass.

name: Momo Special
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']

steps: POUR first 3 ingredients into empty glass. ADD soda water to half fill glass. Fill glass with ice and then top up with more soda. (This avoids 'shocking' the anis with the ice.) Serve with straws.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

steps: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop the flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Moon River

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Moravian Cocktail
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Slivovitz plum brandy', '3⁄4 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Morning Glory
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Morning Glory Fizz
ingredients: ['2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky (from freezer)', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and slowly pour 2/3rds of the contents of the shaker from a higher than normal height into a chilled empty glass (no ice in glass) while simultaneously pouring soda with your other hand. The cocktail and soda should form a single stream of liquid falling into the glass.

As when pouring a Guinness, to achieve a perfect head on a fizz, the cocktail should be left to settle for at least a minute before topping off with what remains in the shaker. Ideally, during the settling period, the glass should be placed in a glass froster/fridge/freezer. As the final contents of the shaker are poured into the glass so the head should rise like a souffle.

name: Moscow Lassi
ingredients: ['2 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Mango purée', '2 shot Apple juice', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 spoon Greek yogurt']

name: Passion Fruit Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Chop passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into the rocks glass and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

steps: POUR pastis and mint syrup into glass. Serve iced water separately in small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste (I recommend five shots). Lastly, add ice to fill glass.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
garnish: Quarter orange wheel on rim (& optional mint sprig)
ingredients: ['2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄24 shot Orange flower/blossom water', '3 drop Vanilla extract (optional)', '3⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 8 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and slowly pour 2/3rds of the contents of the shaker from a higher than normal height into a chilled empty glass (no ice in glass) while simultaneously pouring soda with your other hand. The cocktail and soda should form a single stream of liquid falling into the glass.

As when pouring a Guinness, to achieve a perfect head on a Ramos Gin Fizz, the cocktail should be left to settle for at least a minute before topping off with what remains in the shaker. Ideally, during the settling period, the glass should be placed in a glass froster/fridge/freezer. As the final contents of the shaker are poured into the glass so the head should rise like a souffle.

Some Ramos Gin Fizz recipes, and indeed Henry Charles Ramos' original recipe, call for old tom gin (also our preference), in which case you may need to reduce the amount of sugar syrup depending on your old tom, personal tastes and citrus fruit.

name: Randy Sangaree
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', "3 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters"]

name: Raspberry Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add raspberries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

name: Sangaree (Sangria)

ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Spanish brandy', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3 shot Rioja Crianza red wine', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄12 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '3⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: STIR first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with a splash of soda.

name: Sangria Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot Shiraz red wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Creme de Framboise']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sangrita
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '2 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1 pinch Salt', '1 grind Black pepper']
steps: SHAKE ingredients with ice and strain into shot glass. Serve with a shot of tequila. The drinker can either down the tequila and chase it with sangrita or sip the two drinks alternately.

name: Santiago #1
ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Spiced rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Santiago Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Satsuma Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Oranje Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 3⁄4 shot Apple juice', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Satan's Whiskers (Straight)
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Coupe 8.5oz
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Saturn 'Martini'
ingredients: ['7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '2 spoon Honey', '1 1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. STIR honey with vodka and grapes to dissolve honey. Add wine, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Savannah
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe Gold 7.75oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Savoy Special No.1
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄24 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sazerac Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 1⁄3 shot Chilled water', '2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps:
1. POUR absinthe into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, TOP with water, and leave to stand.
2. THROW other ingredients with ice and set aside.
3. STRAIN contents of the old-fashioned glass into a chilled shot glass to be served as an optional extra alongside the main event.
4. STRAIN contents of shaker into the absinthe rinsed old-fashioned glass.
5. Enjoy a delicious Sazerac with an absinthe shot served alongside.

name: Scandinavian Pop
ingredients: ['2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP up with ginger ale.

name: Scarlett O'Hara
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Scofflaw
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Scorpion
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with sustainable straws.

name: Scotch Bounty Cocktail
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Scotch Milk Punch

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Scotch Negroni
ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Scott
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe

name: Seabreeze
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']

name: Shakerato
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
steps: SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sicilian Negroni Cocktail

name: Sidecar Cocktail (Difford's spec.)
garnish: Orange zest twist (a lemon zest twist is more classic). Some also like a sugared rim but hopefully added Pineau des Charentes richness renders this sweet rim embellishment superfluous.

Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Coupe 8.5oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pineau des Charentes blanc', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Nick & Nora 4.75oz

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']

name: Singapore Sling (using Old Tom gin)
garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

name: Slippery Nipple
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Sambuca', '2⁄3 shot Irish cream liqueur']

name: Sloe Gin Fizz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '4 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with champagne (or soda if you're cheap). Some like to add egg white to enhance foam. (The drink photographed here is without egg white and we prefer without.)

name: Sloe Tequila
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Slow Screw
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Smoky Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Smooth & Creamy
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot Milk (semi-skimmed/2% fat)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Snow White Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. Then DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Snyder Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Socialite

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice

name: Sodden Grape
ingredients: ['7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Bison grass vodka', '3⁄4 shot Canadian icewine']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Solent Sunset
ingredients: ['2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Sorrelade (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['70 gram Hibiscus flowers (Red petals)', '1 1⁄4 litre Chilled water', '30 gram Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice) (chopped)', '12 dried Clove', '3 spoon Honey']
steps: (Bulk recipe.) SOAK dried sorrel in water with ginger, ground cloves, and honey for 12 hours. Bring this mixture to the BOIL then leave to cool and SOAK for a further 12 hours, STRAIN and then keep refrigerated.

name: Sorrel Rum Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '2 shot Sorrelade', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: So So Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass

steps: STIRE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sour (Generic Name)

name: Appletini (Sour Apple Martini)

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

garnish: Float thin apple slice/dehydrated apple slice or Luxardo Maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Sour apple liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: South China Breeze

steps: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh in shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: South Pacific Breeze
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "3⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']
steps: POUR gin and Galliano into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade to just below the rim. DRIZZLE blue curaçao around top of drink (it will sink leaving strings of blue). Serve with straws.

name: Southern Cider
ingredients: ['2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']

name: Screaming Banana Banshee

steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with straws.

name: Seabreeze (layered version)
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: POUR cranberry juice into ice-filled glass. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and carefully strain into glass to LAYER over the cranberry juice. Serve with stirrer and instruct drinker to mix layers prior to drinking.

name: Seelbach

name: Silent Third

steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Singapore Sling (Raffles Formula)
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first eight ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Sir Charles Punch
ingredients: ['1 shot Tawny port', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Sir Thomas
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Nick & Nora 4.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Ski Breeze
ingredients: ['2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '3 shot Apple juice', '3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Sleeping Bison-Tini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Pear & cognac liqueur', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1 shot Apple juice', '1 shot Camomile tea (cold)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sling (Generic Name)
ingredients: ['2 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water (or ginger ale)']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda or ginger ale.

name: Sloe Motion
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: POUR liqueur into chilled glass and TOP with champagne.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin']
steps: STIR first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT sloe gin on surface so it bleeds into drink.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
steps: STIR first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. DRIZZLE sloe gin around surface so it bleeds into drink. FLOAT Galliano.

name: Smartini
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Martini glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Martini 5.75oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Smoky Apple Martini
ingredients: ["2 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Sour apple liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Snakebite
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fill glass with Budweiser Budvar', 'Top up with Medium dry apple cider']
steps: POUR lager into glass and TOP with cider.

name: Snood Murdekin
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. FLOAT cream over drink.

name: Snoopy
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', "1 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Snowfall Cocktail
ingredients: ['1⁄4 whole Vanilla pod', '1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Take 1/4 a vanilla pod and cut along its length. MUDDLE this in the base of a shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Snow On Earth
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Krupnik spiced honey liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Carefully FLOAT cream on drink.

name: Snowball
garnish: Lime zest twist or lime slice
ingredients: ['3 1⁄2 shot Lemonade', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur']
steps: POUR lemonade and lime juice into ice-filled glass and then the advocaat which will mostly sink though the other ingredients. Lightly stir to integrate while retaining the lemonade's carbonation.

name: Sophisticated Savage
ingredients: ['2 shot Tuaca liqueur', '1 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Southern Manhattan
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Southern Mint Cobbler
ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Peach purée']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: Southern Mule
ingredients: ['2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass. TOP with ginger beer, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Southern Peach
ingredients: ['1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Serve with straws.

name: Southern Punch
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Southern Tea
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '2 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: South Side Royale

steps: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with a splash of sparkling wine.

steps: PLACE scoop of ice cream in base of glass. SHAKE next three ingredients with ice and strain over ice cream. TOP with champagne and serve while foaming with straws that the drinker should use to mix.

name: Sparkling Perry
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '3⁄4 shot Pear & cognac liqueur', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

name: Spencer Cocktail
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & speared Luxardo Maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass

steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sputnik #1

garnish: Half strawberry (or lime wedge) on rim

steps:
BLEND all ingredients with a 6oz scoop of crushed ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Seasonal variation: 30 ml strawberry puree as substitute for fresh strawberries.

name: Strawberry Margarita
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['5 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. You may find that the strawberry pulp blocks your fine strainer, so have a spoon handy to help clear the mesh to let the liquid run through.

name: Strawberry Martini
ingredients: ['5 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 grind Black pepper']
steps: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Strudel Martini
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice', '1⁄6 shot Apple sugar syrup', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Stupid Cupid

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Suburban

name: Suitably Frank (shot)

name: Sundowner #1

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sundowner #2

name: Sunny Breeze

name: Sunshine Cocktail No.1

name: Sunshine Cocktail No.2

name: Sunstroke
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters (optional)"]

name: Swamp Water

name: Swedish Blue Cocktail

name: Sweet Louise

name: Tequila Slammer
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: POUR tequila into glass and then carefully LAYER with champagne. The drinker should hold and cover the top of the glass with the palm of their hand so as to grip it firmly and seal the contents inside. Then they should briskly pick the glass up and slam it down (obviously not so hard as to break the glass), then gulp the drink down in one while it is still fizzing.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Ti Punch
garnish: The lime disc in the drink is garnish enough but also consider expressing a lime zest twist over the drink and then discarding.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1⁄4 shot Clement Sirop de Canne', '1 slice Lime (fresh)']
steps:
Traditionally the limes used to make this drink are not cut into slices or wedges. Instead, a round disc is cut from the side of the fruit. These are cut large enough that some of the fruit's flesh backs the peel of the disc.

POUR the rum and sugar into glass. Then SQUEEZE the lime disc between finger and thumb before dropping into the drink. This expresses the oil from the skin and little of the juice into the Ti'Punch. STIR and consider adding ice - either one or two large cubes depending on glass size, or preferably, a small chunk of block ice.

name: Tolleytown Punch
ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

name: Tom & Jerry
ingredients: ['2 fresh Egg white', '2 fresh Egg yolk', '6 spoon White caster sugar', '1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '2 pinch Cinnamon powder', '2 pinch Clove', '3 pinch Freshly grated nutmeg', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', 'Top up with Boiling water']
steps:
1. Pre-warm six 20cl (6.75oz) toddy glasses or Tom & Jerry mugs with hot water.
2. Using a whisk, BEAT the yolks in a mixing bowl "until they are thin as water." Add sugar, Jamaican rum, spices and STIR thoroughly with whisk.
3. In a separate bowl, use a whisk to BEAT the egg whites "to a stiff froth."
4. Use a tablespoon to FOLD the frothy egg whites into the spiced and beaten yolk mixture. This produces the gloopy base mixture known as 'Tom & Jerry batter'.
5. To make individual drinks, to each of the warmed glasses or mugs, POUR cognac and rum, and add two table spoons of Tom & Jerry batter. STIR each glass/mug thoroughly with a barspoon while topping with boiling water.
6. Each should end up with frothy head ready to receive the garnish of grated nutmeg. Serve and enjoy.

ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Tropic
ingredients: ['1 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Tropical Breeze
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Passoã liqueur', '2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Tropical Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1 1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz/15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

4 POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer), coconut liqueur and pineapple juice (also chilled) into the shaker base or glass used to muddle and swirl to rinse before pouring into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

5. Use an Ice Tapper to crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

name: Tropical Daiquiri
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Libbey Tiki Coupe 8.5oz
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']

name: Upside-Down Raspberry Cheesecake
ingredients: ['4 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 fresh Lemon peel (grated)', '2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '5 spoon Mascarpone cheese', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps:
First Layer: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add Chambord, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into centre of glass.

Second Layer: Grate lemon zest into shaker. Add rest of ingredients, SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass over spoon so as to LAYER over raspberry base.

ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Watermelon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Watermelon sugar syrup', '2 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Watermelon Martini
garnish: Fresh watermelon wedge on rim or watermelon slices sweets/candy
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Watermelon liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Webster Martini
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Weeping Jesus
ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass with crushed ice. TOP up with lemonade.

name: The Wentworth
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄4 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1 1⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Dry Martini (2:1 ratio) Wet
garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: What The Hell

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Whip Me & Beat Me
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Milk (semi-skimmed/2% fat)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Whiskey Collins

steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Whiskey Daisy No.1

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Whiskey Sour (Classic Formula)

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Whiskey Sour (Difford's recipe)
garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Whiskey Squirt
ingredients: ['2 shot Peach purée', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda from a siphon. Serve with straws.

name: Whisky Fizz
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Whisky Mac
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Green ginger wine']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

name: White Cosmo

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: White Elephant
garnish: Dust with freshly grated nutmeg (or chocolate powder)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: White Gin Fizz
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 scoop Lemon sorbet', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda from a siphon.

name: White Knight
ingredients: ["3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: White Lady Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (optional)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade.

name: White Satin
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Milk (semi-skimmed/2% fat)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Wibble

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Widow's Kiss

ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Avallen Calvados', '5⁄12 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '5⁄12 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Wine Cooler

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Woodland Punch
ingredients: ['2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Woo Woo
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2 1⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 dash Peach bitters (optional)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Yacht Club
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Yellow Belly
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Yellow Bird
garnish: Banana carved to resemble a bird OR pineapple wedge, Luxardo maraschino cherry & half orange wheel.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Yellow Fever Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Yule Luvit (shot)

steps: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

name: Yum
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Apple juice']

name: Zakuski Cocktail

steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Zamboanga 'Zeinie' Cocktail

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Zanzibar

name: Zaza
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine']
steps: SHAKE (or stir) all ingredients with ice and strain fine into chilled glass.

name: Zelda Cocktail

name: Zesty

name: Zhivago Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Sour apple liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Zingy Ginger Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Ginger sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Zombie

steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.

name: Zombie
ingredients: ['1 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Overproof aged rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄24 shot Pernod anise', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.

name: Zombie
ingredients: ['1 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Overproof aged rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄24 shot Pernod anise', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.

name: Zoom
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Coupe 8.5oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Zubway

name: A1 Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Addington
ingredients: ['1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water (chilled)']
steps: STIR first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with a splash of chilled soda from a bottle/can or just the merest squirt from a chilled soda siphon.

name: Addison
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Adios Amigos #2
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Alabazam
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Alaska No.2

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Alice Mine
ingredients: ['1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Apricot Rickey

name: Arnold Palmer (Alcohol-free*)

name: Bacardi Special
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bee's Knees
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Coupe 8.5oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Alternatively, if making with raw honey (rather than syrup), STIR 4 spoons honey with 22.5ml (¾oz) lemon juice and 10ml (⅓oz) orange juice in base of shaker until honey is dissolved. Add 60ml (2oz gin), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Boxcar
garnish: Sugar rim & orange zest twist (expressed & then discarded)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Brandy Cocktail
ingredients: ['5 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bulldog Highball

name: Adam & Eve #2
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cham Cham

name: Citrus Rum Cooler
