steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade. Lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Crustas (generic name)
garnish: Find a lemon which fits into a small wineglass tightly enough to act as a watertight extension to the glass. Cut off both ends of the fruit and carefully remove the pulp to leave a barrel-shaped shell of skin. Place in the top of the glass. Wet the edge of the glass and exposed fruit shell with sugar syrup and dip in caster sugar to frost the edge of both peel and glass. Leave for a couple of hours to form a hard crust.
ingredients: ['2 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']

name: Daiquiri No.1 Natural (Embury's 8:2:1 formula)

name: Daiquiri No.2

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Baccio Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Anisette liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne', '3⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and soda water. Lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Balabushka
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Balm Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bamboo (Savoy's 1930 recipe)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Banana Flambé
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Banana (overripe)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon White caster sugar', '2 pinch Cinnamon powder', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: In a shallow dish flambé half a split banana with orange juice, sugar and cinnamon. FLAMBÉ until the banana softens completely and the orange juice reduces. Add cognac and flambé further. MUDDLE banana in the base of shaker, add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bandera
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '2 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1 pinch Salt', '1 grind Black pepper']
steps: POUR tequila and lime juice into separate shot (caballitos) glasses. To make Sangrita to fill third glass, SHAKE rest of ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass. Instruct drinker to sip from all three glasses alternatively.

name: Barney Barnato Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe 1910
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Kina aromatised wine', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄12 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bartender's Mum
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Irish cream liqueur']
steps: Carefully LAYER ingredients in the following order.

name: Barton Special Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', "3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Basil Crush
ingredients: ['2 fresh Basil leaves (torn)', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice', '1 shot Green tea (cold)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Honey sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Bat Bite
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Giffard Creme de Framboise', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Batida de Abacaxi
ingredients: ['2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '2 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Condensed milk', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Batida de Banana
ingredients: ['2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1 fresh Banana (overripe)', '1 shot Condensed milk']
steps: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

name: Batida de Carneval
ingredients: ['2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '2 shot Mango purée', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Condensed milk']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws.

name: Batida de Goiaba
ingredients: ['2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '2 1⁄2 shot Guava juice', '1 shot Condensed milk']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Batida de Milho Verde
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '70 gram Sweetcorn (canned)', '1 1⁄2 shot Condensed milk']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: Batida de Morango
ingredients: ['2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '12 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '1 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois', '1⁄2 shot Condensed milk']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

name: Batida Rosa
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: POUR soda water into ice-filled glass. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled and soda charged glass.

name: Beachcomber's Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with one 6oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws.

name: Rum Barrel (by Donn Beach)
garnish: Pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino cherry & mint sprig
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Rum barrel mug or pint glass
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws.

name: Bearskin Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄6 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Beauty Beneath
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bermondsey Breeze
ingredients: ['1 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2 shot Pinot Grigio white wine', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Berry Smash (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '3 fresh Blackberries', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 spoon Honey sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Beverly Hills Hotel Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bicardar
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Big Juicy (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.

name: Biggles Aviation
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄24 shot Crème de violette liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Biggles Sidecar
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bison Sour
ingredients: ['2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 pinch Cinnamon powder', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Bitches Brew
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass
ingredients: ['1 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 shot Egg (white & yolk)']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients without ice. Add ice, SHAKE again and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bitter Grapefruit
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bitter Lady
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 spoon Honey', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Black Eye
ingredients: ['2 fresh Blackberries', '5 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '5 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
steps: MUDDLE first three ingredients in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Black Rose
ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into (empty - no ice) chilled glass.

name: Black Strap
ingredients: ['2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '2 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bloodhound #1
ingredients: ['6 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blood Sage
ingredients: ['3 fresh Sage leaves (torn)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bloody Bronx Cocktail
garnish: Dehydrated blood orange slice or orange zest twist
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an Italesse Presidente Wormwood
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Blood orange juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bloody Mary (Difford's recipe)
garnish: Celery salt & black pepper rim + garnish with celery stick, cherry tomato & strip yellow bell pepper
ingredients: ['1⁄2 ring Yellow bell pepper (optional)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 1⁄4 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄3 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 pinch Celery salt', '3 grind Black pepper', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce']
steps: MUDDLE pepper in base of shaker. Add other ingredients and ice then ROLL (rotate rather than shake) and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Use ice fresh from freezer (rather than ice-machine/ice-well) to fill glass to avoid unwanted dilution.

name: Blue Eyed Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄12 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Hawaii
garnish: Pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino cherry, paper parasol and straw
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Hurricane glass
Photographed in a Libbey Hurricane Squall 15oz
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Blue Mountain Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Sky
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bluegrass
ingredients: ['2 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bobby Burns cocktail (Crockett's recipe)
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass. TOP with water and leave to stand. Separately STIR Scotch, vermouth and bitters with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and fill with fresh ice. STRAIN contents of mixing glass into ice-filled absinthe-coated glass.

name: Bobby De Niro
ingredients: ['1 spoon Apricot jam (preserve)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR jam with gin until jam is dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bohemian Mule
ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.

name: Bonsoni
ingredients: ['2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Fernet liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bouquet
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Rose sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bourbon Renewal
garnish: Lemon wedge or blackcurrants (ideally) or blackberries when in season
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Brandy Daisy
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Soda from siphon']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with a splash of soda and briefly stir.

name: Breakfast Club
ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '1 spoon Honey', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Lapsang Souchong tea (cold)']
steps: STIR honey and marmalade with rum until dissolved. Add tea, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Broken Spur
ingredients: ['3 shot Dry white port', '1⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Anisette liqueur', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bronze Adonis
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 1⁄2 shot Ambre/amber vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bullfrog #2
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: POUR vodka and lime into ice-filled glass and TOP with lemonade or lemon-lime soda.

name: Butterfly Cocktail
ingredients: ['8 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '3 fresh Basil leaves', '3 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Byculla
garnish: Slice fresh ginger or candied ginger on rim
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '2⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The C&C
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
steps: LAYER by carefully pouring ingredients in the following order.

name: Caipi
ingredients: ['3⁄4 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE lime in base of shaker. Add rest of ingredients, SHAKE with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and pour without straining into glass.

name: Caipiruva Bacchanalia
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '5 fresh Red grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1 shot Honey sugar syrup', '3⁄4 shot Sauternes dessert wine', "3 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
steps: MUDDLE lime and grapes in base of shaker to release juices. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

name: Campirinha
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '1⁄4 fresh Ruby red grapefruit (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE lime and grapefruit in base of shaker to release juices. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

name: Capitano
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Casino
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Casse Noissette
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. FLOAT thin layer of cream over drink.

name: Champagne Pick-Me-Up
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Champino
ingredients: ['1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 2 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Chartreuse Swizzle
garnish: Pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino cherry & dusting of freshly grated nutmeg
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick (or churn with a barspoon). Add more crushed ice to fill and SWIZZLE some more. Serve with straws.

name: Cherry Mariner
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Chrysanthemum
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Chubacabras Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄6 shot Orange flower/blossom water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine-strain into chilled glass.

name: Churchill Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin (from freezer)']
steps: STIR gin with ice while glancing at an unopened bottle of dry vermouth. Strain into chilled glass.

name: Cider House Rules
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄2 spoon Cinnamon powder']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice & fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Clairvoyant
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice & fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Clara Astié Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 spoon Apricot jam (preserve)', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR jam with rum until jam dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Clover Club (Lowe's recipe)
garnish: Float raspberry in centre of drink
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Clover Club (Difford's recipe)
garnish: Lemon zest twist (sprayed & discarded) & fresh raspberry
ingredients: ['5 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients (including raspberries which will be pulped by shaking) with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cloysters
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters (optional)", '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice & fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Clubland Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Dry white port', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice & fine strain into chilled glass.

name: El Coco
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Coconut water', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Coffee Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Tawny port', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cold Blooded
ingredients: ['1 fresh Rosemary sprig', '1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE rosemary in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice & fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Colony
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup) (optional)', "4 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cooperstown
ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients (including mint) with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Corpse Reviver No.1 (Gilberg's recipe)
ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Corpse Reviver No.2 (Contemporary Recipe)
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cornwall Negroni
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Cosmogroni
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Crapple (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 shot Apple juice', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Serve with straws.

name: Cream Soda Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade.

name: Crushed Strawberry Fizz
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Fizz or Highball (8oz to 10oz)
ingredients: ['3 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
steps: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients apart from soda, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with soda.

name: Cuban Heal
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Honey sugar syrup', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Cubata
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '4 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola & Pepsi Cola)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

name: Cunningham
garnish: Flamed blood orange zest twist and Luxardo maraschino cherry
ingredients: ["1 3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.

name: Daiquiri Authentico
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Daiquiri (on-the-rocks)
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Daiquiri (frozen)
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and then STRAIN blended drink through a fine strainer to remove ice slush.

name: Daiquiri No.3
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB 1910 Old Fashioned 10.5oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Daiquiri No.4 (Florida style)
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime (fresh)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with finely crushed ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Daiquiri No.5 (Pink Daiquiri)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Daiquiri Noir
ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Damn It Jimmy
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Darlington
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Death In The Gulf Stream
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 grated zest of Lime (fresh)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) and add more ice until glass is filled.

name: The Democrat
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Collins glass
Photographed in an UB Koto Collins 35cl
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Devil's Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Tawny port', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.

name: Devil's Share
ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Maple syrup']
steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Dimi-tini
ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Filthy Dirty Martini
garnish: Chilled olives on stick & lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Olive brine (from jarred olive)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Dixie Cosmopolitan
garnish: Cinnamon & sugar rim with orange zest twist (flamed)
ingredients: ['2 inch Cinnamon stick', '1 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps: Brake up section of cinnamon and drop into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Doheny Pisco Punch
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

name: La Dolce Vita
ingredients: ['4 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 spoon Honey', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add vodka, honey and bitters, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

name: Don Daisy
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Don's Delight
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Don's Passion
ingredients: ['1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh and seeds into shaker. Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Pour grenadine into centre of drink (should sink to bottom).

name: Dreiklang (Three of a Kind)
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '2 dash Xocolatl mole bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Dry Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Dubonnet Cocktail No.1
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Dubonnet Cocktail #2
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Dutch Martini
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Dutch Master
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄6 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: East Meets West Julep
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Pomegranate juice', '7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: East Village Athletic Club
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Eastern Raspberry Sidecar
ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Sake', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Eastern Sin
ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) to emulsify and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Eighteen '97
ingredients: ['5 fresh Kumquats (chopped)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1 1⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Merlot red wine']
steps: MUDDLE kumquats in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, shake and fine strain into a chilled glass. FLOAT wine.

name: Elixir 66
ingredients: ['1 fresh Coriander / cilantro leaves', '1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄6 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE coriander in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Elixirita
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lime (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Especie
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "2⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Eureka Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Facundo's Flare
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2 dash Peach bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Falconi
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Tawny port', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Fallen Angel
garnish: Mint leaf or float tip of mint sprig
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe 1910
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fig Supreme
ingredients: ['2 fresh Figs', '2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: Scoop out the flesh of figs and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Final Ward
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fifth Degree
ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: STIR Campari with ice (to coat ice and glass) and then strain to discard excess. Add other ingredients, STIR with coated ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Fitzgerald
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Fizz á la Violette
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Fizz or Highball (8oz to 10oz)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1⁄4 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
steps:
1/ Flash BLEND first 6 ingredients without ice (to emulsify mix). Then pour contents of blender into shaker and SHAKE with ice. Strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass) and TOP with soda from siphon.

Alternatively: 2/ SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice). TOP with soda water from siphon.

name: Flame of Love Martini
ingredients: ['3 twist Orange peel', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry']
steps: Pour sherry into chilled glass, swirl to coat inside and discard excess. Using a match or lighter, express and ignite the oils from the orange peel so the burnt oil coats the inside of the sherry-coated glass. SHAKE the vodka with ice and fine strain into the coated glass.

name: Flipping Good
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', "1 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 fresh Egg yolk']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Flip Williams
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Poire William liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Formosa
ingredients: ['2 shot Sake', '2 shot Dry white port']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Four Leaf Clover
ingredients: ['1 dried Clove', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Apple juice', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey sugar syrup']
steps: MUDDLE clove in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: French Connection
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Pastis Whisky Sour
garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)
ingredients: ["1 2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄3 shot Ricard Pastis', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Frisco Sour
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & lemon slice wheel & maraschino cherry sail
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (optional)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Full Monte
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first eight ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne, lightly stir and serve with straws.

name: Fumigator Flip
garnish: Dust with grated nutmeg & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gin Daisy #2 (Jerry Thomas style)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 Splash Soda from siphon']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with a splash of soda from a siphon.

name: Gin Daisy #3 (Modern long style)
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and serve with straws.

name: Gin Gin
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Green ginger wine']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Gin Punch #2
ingredients: ['3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 shot Chilled water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Serve with straws.

name: Ginger Beer Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Ginger Snap
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

name: Golden Reign

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Mulata Daisy
ingredients: ['1 spoon Fennel seeds', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "1⁄3 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao']
steps: MUDDLE fennel seeds in the base of shaker. Add lime juice and powdered sugar and stir until sugar is dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Myrtle Bank Special Rum Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Naranja
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot Cinzano Orancio Vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR one shot of rum with two ice cubes in a glass. Add sugar syrup, vermouth, bitters and two more ice cubes. STIR some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the rum. STIR lots more and add more ice.

name: Negroni Sbagliato
ingredients: ['1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 shot Manzoni Rosa Extra Dry Spumante']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly STIR.

name: Negroni Spumante
ingredients: ['1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', 'Top up with Manzoni Rosa Extra Dry Spumante']
steps: POUR first 3 ingredients into ice-filled glass. TOP with spumante and lightly STIR.

name: Negroski
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
steps: Pour ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.

name: The Neutral Ground
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: New Orleans Black
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

name: New York Flip
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Vigorously SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Ninth Ward
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Michelangelo Coppa 225ml
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Nola Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Orange Bitters by Angostura', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Northern Sun
ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup']
steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Noshino Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1 1⁄2 shot Shochu']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Nuez Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Nocello walnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Apple juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Oceans 21
ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Oooh Ginger
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '2⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Old Crystal Shrine
ingredients: ['1 spoon White truffle honey', '2 shot Japanese blended whisky', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass.

name: Old Cuban
ingredients: ['6 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3⁄4 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Orange Spur
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Anisette liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Orchard Crush

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass.

name: Oriental
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Original Sin

steps: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass and top with water. Leave the mixture to stand in the glass. Separately, STIR all ingredients with ice. Finally discard contents of absinthe-coated glass and fine strain contents of shaker into absinthe washed glass.

garnish: Pineapple cubes, Luxardo Maraschino cherry & orange slice

steps: Place lemon zest in shaker, add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Papa Bear
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Krupnik spiced honey liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Elderflower Manhattan
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe 1910
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Patrick Gavin Duffy's Punch
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: El Pedroni
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Penicillin cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB Ginza Old Fashioned 10.5oz
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

name: Pepin Rivero Special

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker, DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: Taking care not to break the egg yolk, PLACE it in the centre of the hollow in the glass. SHAKE the rest of the ingredients with ice and strain over egg. Instruct drinker to down in one.

Serve in a Coupe glass

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Serve in a Nick & Nora glass

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Quince Mustard Margarita
ingredients: ['1 spoon Quince mustard jam', '2 grind Black pepper', '1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Reversed Vesper & Tonic 'Martini'

name: Rum Amandine

name: Saratoga Cocktail #2

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Shark's Tooth (by Don Beach)

steps:
1. POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and leave to stand.
2. Separately STIR gin, vermouth and elderflower liqueur with ice.
3. DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and STRAIN contents of mixing glass into absinthe-coated glass. (No ice in glass.)

name: Queen's Park Swizzle
ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps:
1. Lightly MUDDLE mint with rum in base of glass. Use your bar spoon to raise the bruised mint up and around the inside of the glass to coat with fragrant mint oils.
2. Add other ingredients and two-thirds fill glass with crushed ice.
3. SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick or CHURN (stir) with a bar spoon.
4. Fill glass with more crushed ice.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass filled with crushed ice and churn to mix cocktail with ice until outside of glass frosts. Top with more crushed ice to fill glass.

name: Wisecrack Fizz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and serve with straws.

name: Act of Violets
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Amalfi
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients. Add ice, SHAKE again and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Apple Fool
ingredients: ['5 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Grapefruit juice (ruby red)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Apple Martini (with apple schnapps)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '2 shot Apple juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: BBC (by Marian Beke)
garnish: Apple fan or dehydrated apple slice wheel
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1 dash Wormwood bitters (optional)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Benton's Old Fashioned
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey (bacon fat washed)', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps:
STIR bourbon and maple syrup in base of mixing glass until syrup dissolves. Add bitters and ice and STIR again. Strain into ice-filled glass.

To make fat-washed bourbon: Grill 4 slices of bacon (originally made using Benton's bacon, hence the name, but any extra-smoky bacon will suffice) to obtain 30ml/1oz of warm bacon fat and pour this into 70cl of bourbon (in a 75cl bottle). Leave to infuse at room temperature for a day before placing the bottle in a freezer to solidify the fat. Then clarify the bourbon by straining it into a clean bottle.

name: Berlin Sour
garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass
ingredients: ['2 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
