name: Scottish Gypsy
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ["1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Smokestack Lightning
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters (optional)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain with ice.

name: Starry Night
ingredients: ['2 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine', '1⁄2 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Stratosphere
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Crème de violette liqueur', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: POUR liqueur into glass and TOP with champagne.

name: Sweetie Pie
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 pinch Salt']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Summit
ingredients: ['1 twist Lime (fresh) (zest)', '1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE lime zest and ginger slices in base of mixing glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Tabula Rasa
ingredients: ['1 shot Mozart Chocolate Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Tanglefoot
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Tapered Nail
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Too Ache Sidecar
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Tuaca liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Unicar
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Velvet Elvis
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda.

name: Velvet Threesome
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Waterloo Sunset
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', 'Top up with Brut Champagne', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)']
steps: STIR first two ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne. Add raspberry liqueur.

name: White Tigers
ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Absinthe Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Applejack Rabbit
garnish: Cinnamon stick and dust with freshly grated cinnamon
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Jam jar glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Applejack brandy bottled-in-bond (50% alc./vol)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled jar.

name: Bohemian Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Buckeye
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Cablegram
ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Ginger sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Le Dijonnais Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Galander Fine mustard liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 dash Celery bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fiendtini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄8 shot Pickled cucumber/gherkin brine/vinegar']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Hollywood
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Improved Holland Gin Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄24 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄24 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄24 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. [To measure 1.25ml and how many dashes in 1.25ml, please see Measuring cocktail ingredients.]

name: King's Jubilee
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & skewered maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
Photographed in an Urban Bar Nick & Nora
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mantini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot British bitter ale']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Melba Cocktail
garnish: Float mint leaf or peg to rim
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a LSA Olivia Champagne Saucer
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Porn Star Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Passoã liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Brut Champagne (optional)']
steps:
Wash and cut 2 fresh passion fruits in half, SCOOP out the seeds and flesh of 3 halves into your shaker. (Keep last passion fruit half for garnish.) Add next four ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Optionally, separately, POUR champagne into chilled shot glass to serve on the side. Instruct drinker to sip alternately from each glass.

name: The Quad
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Oranje Vodka', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Roosevelt Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Skid Row
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Sweet Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Tijuana Brass
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Agave syrup', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Top with cucumber foam (fill a cream whipper two-thirds full with equal parts cucumber juice, 1:1 simple syrup and egg white, charge with two CO2 cartridges and chill).

name: Tip Top Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Green Deacon
ingredients: ['1⁄24 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: MIST chilled glass with spray or rinse of absinthe to coat the inside and set aside. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into absinthe-rinsed chilled glass.

name: London Gypsy
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Red Hook
ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bobby Burns cocktail (Embury's recipe)
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ["1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Drambuie liqueur', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass

name: Pickle Back
ingredients: ['1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 shot Pickled cucumber/gherkin brine/vinegar']
steps: POUR ingredients into two separate chilled glasses. Instruct drinker to drink whiskey followed by cucumber chaser.

name: Sherry Cobbler
garnish: Pineapple wedge, orange slice, mint sprig bouquet & seasonal berry
ingredients: ['2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Submarine Kiss
ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot Crème Yvette liqueur', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: POUR liqueur into base of chilled glass. SHAKE the rest of the ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and carefully fine strain into the liqueur-primed glass so contents of shaker float over liqueur.

name: Palomino Flor
garnish: Short pale yellow stalk and leaf from celery heart
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Celery juice (freshly extracted)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur']
steps: MUDDLE celery in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Amatitan Twist
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', "2 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Hee Bee Jee Bees
ingredients: ['1 shot Honey flavoured vodka', '1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3 drop Bob's Lavender Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Benny & Hot
ingredients: ['2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '4 shot Boiling water']
steps: POUR ingredients into warmed glass.

name: Bernice
garnish: Mint leaf pegged to rim or float very tip of mint sprig
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: La Bicyclette
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2 dash Peach bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bourbon Skin
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3 shot Boiling water', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Place barspoon in warmed glass. POUR all ingredients into warmed glass and STIR.

name: Russian Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Rusty Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Rusty Margarita
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Angel's Draft
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '3 fresh Mint leaves', '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) to emulsify and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Aperol Spritz / Aperitivo Spritz
ingredients: ['3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.

name: Auld Alliance
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 2⁄3 shot Lemonade']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade.

name: Beggar's Banquet
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Maple syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with British bitter ale']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with beer.

name: Blue Moon Cocktail (Dale DeGroff's recipe)
ingredients: ['1 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 spoon Oolong tea', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '1 fresh Sage leaves']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE blueberry in base of shaker (just to break skin). ADD vodka and one heaped spoon of oolong tea and stir in base of shaker for 60 seconds (or better still, leave to steep for ten minutes). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Breakfast in Manhattan
ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR marmalade with bourbon to dissolve marmalade. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Caribeño
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '4 shot Coconut water', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all the ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass.

name: Charlie Chaplin Cocktail
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Chocolate Stinger
ingredients: ['2 shot Mozart Chocolate Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Cognac Julep
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into julep cup half filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top up the cup with more crushed ice and CHURN again. Repeat this process until the drink fills the cup and serve.

name: Comet Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Continental Sour
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '1⁄4 shot Tawny port']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Finish with a drizzle of port around drink.

name: Cordova Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. To prevent curdling, add the cream to the shaker after the ice and immediately before shaking.

name: Corpse Reviver No.Blue
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Creole Gimlet
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Daiquiri No.1 Natural (Countdown 3:2:1 formula)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Death in Venice
ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', "3 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '4 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: POUR Campari and grapefruit bitters into chilled glass and TOP with Prosecco.

name: Detroit Athletic Club
garnish: Float thin lemon wheel or dehydrated slice of lemon on surface
ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Devil's Horn
garnish: Two chillies on rim to form devil's horns
ingredients: ['1 slice Red jalapeño/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded & chopped (fine sliced)', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE (just press) chilli pepper in base of shaker to release its flavour. (If you muddle hard then the finished cocktail will be overly spicy). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Dutch Word
garnish: Lime zest twist (discarded) & lime wedge on rim
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '2⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: 8th Day (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Jasmine tea (cold)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Ginger sugar syrup', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Entwistle's Error
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

name: Fandango
garnish: Mint leaf or mint sprig pegged to rim
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Fanhattan
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Crème de figue', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fogerty
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Fur Collar
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gamble
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Gin Twist
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Boiling water']
steps: POUR ingredients into pre-warmed glass and STIR.

name: The Gold Rush
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
Photographed in an UB Nick and Nora Gold 6oz
ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Zubrowka Cocktail
ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄4 shot Cinnamon schnapps & Goldwasser liqueurs', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, top with water and stand to one side. Separately STIR other ingredients with ice. Dump contents of glass and strain stirred drink into the absinthe washed glass.

name: Woxum
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Woodside
ingredients: ['1⁄2 ring Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Ruby port', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth (grapefruit infused)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker and add other ingredients. DRY SHAKE (without ice), then SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Weissen Sour
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 spoon Orange marmalade', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', 'Top up with Erdinger Weisbier']
steps: STIR marmalade with bourbon in base of shaker to dissolve marmalade. Add lemon juice and bitters, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with beer.

name: Wild Irish Rose
garnish: Lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water (optional)']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Whoop It Up
ingredients: ['1 shot Honey flavoured vodka', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "3 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Whisky Flower
ingredients: ['2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice) SHAKE again with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Voodoo I Do
ingredients: ['1 ring Pineapple (fresh)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Very Rusty Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '2⁄3 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Up In The Air
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) and float (dehydrated) apple slice or wedge on rim
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Tropic Thunder
garnish: Dust with freshly ground black pepper
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Tres Amigos Daiquiri
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '5⁄6 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄6 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Treacle No.2
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄4 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR half the rum with two ice cubes in a chilled glass. Add PX sherry, sugar syrup, bitters, and two more ice cubes. STIR some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the rum. STIR some more and add more ice.

name: Tonka
ingredients: ['2 shot Japanese blended whisky', '1 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Mozart Chocolate Vodka', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Swedish Ale Punch
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with British bitter ale']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with beer.

name: Swedish Margarita
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Strawberry on Acid
ingredients: ['3 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois', '1⁄6 shot Balsamic vinegar of Modena', '1 pinch Black pepper', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: The Stone Place
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Staffordshire Delight
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Boulevardier Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Dunaway
ingredients: ['2 1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Francophile Martini
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: French Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Matinee
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '2 leaf Kaffir lime (fresh fruit)']
steps: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients. SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Maya Margarita
garnish: Pink river salt rim & lime wedge
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Calamansi juice (optional)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Millennium Cocktail
garnish: Orange zest twist & dust with grated nutmeg
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: New York, New York
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Origins
ingredients: ['1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot Rioja Crianza red wine', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Praecocia Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Retro Coupe Gold 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Prince of Wales Punch
ingredients: ['1⁄4 ring Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port']
steps: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Float the port on drink.

name: Purgatory a la Française
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
Photographed in an Urban Bar Nick & Nora
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Tequila Basil Lemonade
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3 fresh Basil leaves', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and gently stir.

name: Grand Berry
ingredients: ['4 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur']
steps: POUR cranberry juice into ice-filled glass to half fill. ADD lime juice and Grand Marnier.

name: Grand Espirit
ingredients: ['3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Elderflower cordial']
steps: POUR soda into ice-filled glass to half fill. ADD garnish, Grand Marnier and elderflower. TOP with more soda water.

name: Grand Mojito
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '8 fresh Mint leaves']
steps: POUR ingredients into glass and half fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more. Keep adding ice and churning until drink fills glass. Serve with straws.

name: Grand 'O'
ingredients: ['2 1⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '2 1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 wedge Lemon (fresh) (optional)']
steps: POUR soda water into ice-filled glass to half fill. ADD lemon juice, orange juice and Grand Marnier. TOP with soda.

name: Grand Sour
ingredients: ['2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (optional)']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Beuser & Angus Special
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 whole Egg (white & yolk)', '3 dash Orange flower/blossom water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into glass filled with cubed or crushed ice.

name: Hey Hey Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: In And Out Martini
garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin']
steps: Gently SHAKE vermouth with ice. Strain and discard vermouth to leave the ice in the shaker coated with vermouth. Add gin, SHAKE again with coated ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Jammie Dodger
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: POUR liqueur into glass and then float cream on top.

name: Cheeky Vimto
ingredients: ['2 shot Ruby port', '1 bottle WKD Original Blue']
steps: Pour port into glass and TOP with WKD Blue.

name: Grounds For Divorce
ingredients: ['4 wedge Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine stain into chilled glass.

name: Hi Ladies!
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Highlander
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hot Wine Lemonade
ingredients: ['2 shot Claret red wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Boiling water']
steps: POUR first three ingredients into warmed glass and top up with boiling water.

name: Italian Milk Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian Brandy', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '3 1⁄2 shot Milk (semi-skimmed/2% fat)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Lavender Honey Sour
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: De La Louisiane
ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Machine Head
garnish: Luxardo Maraschino cherry & orange zest twist
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Xocolatl mole bitters', '3 pinch Lychee rose tea (smoked)']
steps: POUR all ingredients except tea into mixing glass. SMOKE tea using a chefs smoker and direct smoke into mixing glass. Cover to capture smoke for a minute or so. Remove cover, STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Mediterranean Fizz
ingredients: ['8 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5 fresh Basil leaves', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shake. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice filled glass. TOP with soda water.

name: Merchant of Venice
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Meryl Lynchburg
ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (or mug), TOP with soda water

name: Mixed Berry Julep
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 fresh Blackberries', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE berries in base of glass. Add mint, bourbon, cognac, and sugar syrup into glass, add crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Top up the glass with more crushed ice and CHURN again. Repeat this process until the drink fills the glass and serve.

name: Mizuwari
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", 'Top up with Chilled water']
steps: Fill glass with ice and STIR until water forms in base of glass. Add more ice and continue stirring to cool glass. STRAIN water from glass, pour whisky into glass and top with ice to brim of glass. STIR whisky and ice, adding more ice to keep ice level with brim. Lastly, add water and briefly stir some more.

name: Monsieur Lecroix
ingredients: ['2 shot Mozart Chocolate Vodka', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Monstre Verte Cocktail
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '4 fresh Basil leaves']
steps: POUR aniseed into ice-filled glass and TOP with chilled water. Separately SHAKE rest of ingredients with ice. DISCARD contents of glass and refill with fresh ice. Then fine strain contents of shaker into the now absinthe-coated glass.

name: Monte Cassino
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Moo'lata
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Mulberry
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 spoon Mulberry jam', '7 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Fruit cup liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Elderflower pressé']
steps: STIR jam and gin in base of shaker to dissolve jam. Add mint, Pimm's and lemon juice, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with elderflower pressé.

name: Nanhi Pari
ingredients: ['1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Shiraz red wine', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur']
steps: MUDDLE rosemary in base of mixing glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Nelson's Blood Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Ruby port']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Netherland Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup) (optional)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Noblesse
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Oh Cecilie!
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Amer Picon', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Opening Act
ingredients: ['2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

name: Oaxaca Old-Fashioned
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR tequila with three ice cubes in a glass. Add other ingredients and STIR with more ice. Top up ice and STIR some more.

name: Papa Ghirardelli
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Penthouse Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: La Perla
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '3⁄4 shot Poire William liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Peroni Negroni
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Shot and Beer glass
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 bottle Peroni lager']
steps: STIR gin, Campari and vermouth with ice and fine strain into chilled shot glass. Carefully position the shot glass in the beer glass. Then carefully POUR Peroni into beer glass so not quite reaching the top of the shot glass, being careful not to splash any beer into shot glass. Instruct drinker to drink from beer glass and so inevitably also shot glass. Use sturdy glassware.

name: Phish Hook
ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass.

name: Pisco Bell Ringer
ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: RINSE chilled glass with apricot brandy (swirl liqueur round inside of glass to coat and then shake out excess). SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into apricot rinsed glass.

name: Pop My Cherry
ingredients: ['1 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka (infused with vanilla)', '1 shot Milk (semi-skimmed/2% fat)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Preakness Manhattan
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Preserve Cocktail
ingredients: ['8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Procrastination Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Prospector
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Rainwater/Verdelho med-dry madeira', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Punch & Judy
garnish: Lime wheel & dust with grated nutmeg
ingredients: ['6 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Red Manhattan
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Claret red wine', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Rhine Wine Cobbler
garnish: A grape, orange and pineapple slice
ingredients: ['3 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 wedge Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '3 shot Riesling wine', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE grapes and pineapple in base of shaker and fine strain (without shaking) into glass filled with crushed ice. POUR other ingredients into glass and cobble (churn/stir) with barspoon to thoroughly mix.

name: Rhubarb Triangle
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Giffard Rhubarbe Liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Royal Toast
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Rusty To The Core
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: St Lawrence
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Sargasso
ingredients: ['2 shot Martinique V.S.O.P rum', '3⁄4 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Smoke and Mirrors #1
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: POUR ingredients into mixing glass, SMOKE (with applewood smoke), then STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Smoky Old Bastard
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 bag Lapsang Souchong tea (cold)', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup', "2 dash Boker's bitters"]
steps: STIR half the bourbon, tea bag and four ice cubes in glass for 60 seconds. Remove tea bag, add maple syrup and bitters, and STIR some more. Add more ice and the rest of the bourbon. STIR lots more and add more ice.

name: Sourise
ingredients: ['5 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: South Ireland Sour
ingredients: ['1 shot Feijoa flavoured vodka', '1 shot Stout beer', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). Add ice, SHAKE again and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Special
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: St Croix Sunset
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Corn'n'Oil Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB Tin Can Tumbler
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum']
steps: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. FLOAT black rum on surface of the drink.

name: Blue Lassi
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka (infused with vanilla)', '1 1⁄2 shot Yoghurt liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '2 dash Rose water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bombay Lassi Cocktail

steps: MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: MUDDLE cardamom and then pineapple in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

garnish: Raspberries & dust with cracked black pepper

steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Strawberry Jive

name: Subourbon

steps: POUR tonic water into old-fashioned glass. Then POUR gin into shot glass. Instruct drinker to hold gin-filled shot glass directly over surface of tonic water and drop shot into old-fashioned glass and consume.

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass.

steps: POUR Jägermeister into shot glass and separately POUR Red Bull into old-fashioned glass. Instruct drinker to drop shot of Jägermeister into a glass of Red Bull.

name: Cement Mixer
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Irish cream liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
steps: POUR cream liqueur into glass and carefully LAYER lime juice so it floats on cream liqueur. Instruct drinker to hold and swirl the drink around in their mouth before swallowing.

name: Cajun Thunder

steps: POUR ingredients into glass and serve.

name: Black Nail #2

name: Gentleman's Agreement

name: Cantaritos
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Cantaritos clay pot or Collins glass
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 pinch Salt', '2 shot Thomas Henry Pink Grapefruit soda']
steps:
If using a Cantaritos clay pot (instead of a collins glass) submerge the pot in cold water to clean the inside and wet the outside clay.

POUR ingredients into ice-filled pot or glass and STIR. Consider serving with straws.

name: Milanese Breakfast Martini

name: Vodka Daisy

name: Slutty Mary

ingredients: ['2 spoon Homemade paste', '2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Tomato juice']
steps:
ROLL (turn shaker over repeatedly rather than shake) all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
To make paste, blend:
1 can of La Costena Chipotle Chilli in Adobo Sauce
2 large bunches of fresh coriander
1 tablespoon of salt
1 tablespoon of black pepper
100ml Agavero tequila liqueur
500ml Worcestershire sauce

ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
