name: Dry Martini (7:1 ratio) Embury's
garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist.
ingredients: ['2 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Dry Martini (2:1.5 ratio) Sopping Wet
garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Boston Deluxe
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Saffron syrup (2:1 sugar syrup heated with saffron fronds)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gin Salad Dry Martini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Malty Dry Martini
garnish: Chilled olive or lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "4 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Gold Rush on the Rocks
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Jenever Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 dash Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP up with soda.

name: Hunter Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 drop Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Christmas Pudding & Custard Cocktail
garnish: Serve chilled Pedro Ximenez sherry on the side
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled coupe glass. POUR chilled Pedro Ximenez sherry into second smaller glass to be served on the side

name: Christmas Velvet Alexander
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) and freshly grated nutmeg
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Fino sherry']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Christmopolitan
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) and string red currants
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Christmas Margarita
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & rosemary sprig spiked with cranberries or float a dehydrated orange slice
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Whiskey Tea Highball
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Lapsang souchong sugar syrup', '1 shot Lapsang Souchong tea (cold)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with soda.

name: Dark'n'Stormy shot
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum']
steps: POUR the first 3 ingredients into the glass in the following order. Then carefully FLOAT rum on the surface of the drink.

name: Midnight in New York
ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Shiraz red wine', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Dutch Blood and Sand
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Little Smith
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bison grass vodka', '5⁄6 shot Avallen Calvados', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Apple juice', '1 fresh Wasabi leaf']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Creole Contentment
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Sercial (dry) Madeira wine', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Colonial Cooler
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Amer Picon', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP up with soda.

name: Sharman-Cox Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fen Ella
ingredients: ['15 dried Fennel seeds', "2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Ricard Pastis', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: MUDDLE fennel in stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Kopstoot
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Shot and Beer glass
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever (chilled)', '1⁄2 pint Belgium dubbel abbey ale']
steps: POUR genever into shot glass and beer into beer glass. To enjoy, simply sip a shot of ice-cold genever from a small, tulip-shaped glass, then follow with a sip of beer.

name: Hi Falutin
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Shaky Pete’s Ginger Brew
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Rum barrel mug or pint glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Ginger sugar syrup', '4 shot British bitter ale']
steps: Blitz BLEND the first three ingredients with two ice cubes for ten seconds. Fine strain into chilled glass and TOP with beer. See Origin for Pete's original homemade ginger syrup.

name: Portobello Star Manhattan (Perfect)
ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', "1 dash Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Maid in Cuba
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup) (2 sugar to 1 water)', '7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 slice Cucumber (fresh)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and leave to stand. Separately SHAKE other ingredients with ice (Don’t muddle cucumber). DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and STRAIN contents of shaker into absinthe-coated glass. TOP with splash of soda.

name: Death Flip
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup) (2 sugar to 1 water)', '1 whole Egg (white & yolk)', '1 pinch Freshly grated nutmeg']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Betsy Ross
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Brown Derby
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Made Man
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Wolf Ticket
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Peach (fresh & ripe - skinned & diced)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: MUDDLE peach in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Rapscallion
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) and olive on a stick
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Ricard Pastis', '1 1⁄2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water']
steps: POUR pastis into chilled glass, TOP with chilled water and leave to stand. Separately STIR other ingredients with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (pastis, water and ice) and STRAIN contents of stirring glass into pastis-coated glass.

name: Foxy Lady
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Kirsch Cosmo
ingredients: ['1 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: French Maid
ingredients: ['3 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add next 5 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

name: Silk Road
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Dopo Cena
ingredients: ['1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup) (2 sugar to 1 water)', '1 dash Pasteurised egg white', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Garden, Grain & Grape
ingredients: ['5 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1 dash Pasteurised egg white (optional)']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, DRY SHAKE (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Green Park
ingredients: ['6 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Celery bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE basil in base of shaker (just to bruise). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Punch Back
garnish: Pineapple wedge on rim with cherries on stick
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 shot Coconut water', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Salty Bird
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "8 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Jack Pot
garnish: Strawberry with mint sprig crown on rim
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄4 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Single malt Welsh whisky', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot British bitter ale', '1⁄4 shot Apple juice']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Northern Glow
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Rhubarb bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Agua De Cuba
ingredients: ['1 slice Watermelon (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', "2⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: Cut watermelon into 16 segments, chop the flesh from one segment into cubes and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Amaretto Sour (by Jeffrey Morgenthaler)
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherries on stick.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and pour into ice-filled glass.

name: Anis-thetic
garnish: Mint sprig & absinthe mist from atomiser
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Anisette liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into an empty chilled glass.

name: The Ansonia
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an Italesse Presidente Wormwood
ingredients: ["1 2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Beautiful Lady
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Mozart Chocolate Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', 'Float Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: STIR first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. FLOAT thin layer of lightly whipped cream.

name: BG3
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Bitter Lemon']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with bitter lemon and lightly stir.

name: Bijou Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & skewered Luxardo Maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
Photographed in an Urban Bar Nick & Nora
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Blue Train
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bridgetown Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '5⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '5⁄12 shot Grapefruit juice (ruby red)', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bushranger
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and stain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Cappa Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineau des Charentes blanc', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Chinato Nail
ingredients: ["2 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Antica Ricetta Barolo Chinato']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Eastern Promises
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Easy Speak
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup) (2 sugar to 1 water)', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

name: El Momento Perfecto
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '2⁄3 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 spoon Orange marmalade']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of black ice).

name: Elderflower Gin Fizz
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Fizz or Highball (8oz to 10oz)
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chill glass (without ice). TOP with soda.

name: Emerson
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: General Harrison's Nogg
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '2 shot Medium dry apple cider', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Pimento bitters', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
steps: Using an especially designed 'fizz' shaker (such as Perlini) that's designed to be carbonated. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass (without ice). Be sure to shake well to completely emulsify the egg.

name: The Getaway (AKA Cynar Daiquiri)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gin Basil Smash
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB Ginza Old Fashioned 10.5oz
ingredients: ['12 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE basil in base of SHAKER. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Haberdasher
garnish: Dust with cocoa & garnish with a mint leaf
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps:
1. STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
2. SHAKE Chartreuse and cream with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and LAYER by carefully pouring over surface of drink.

name: Hawaiian Stone Sour
garnish: Pineapple slice and Luxardo Maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Hocus Pocus
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Jack Tar
ingredients: ['1 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Lone Ranger
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Maida Vale
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Mezzo E Mezzo
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Nardini Rosso', '1 1⁄2 shot Rabarbaro liqueur', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

name: Monet's Moment
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably with one large hand-cracked cube)

name: Montgomery Slugger
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Nocello walnut liqueur', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Montréal
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Pernod anise', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Moonwalk Cocktail
garnish: Orange zest twist (spray & discard) & quarter orange slice on rim
ingredients: ['1 cube Sugar cube', "3 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '2 dash Orange flower/blossom water', '5⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: Drop sugar cube into glass and soak with dashes of grapefruit bitters and orange flower water. POUR liqueur over soaked sugar cube. TOP with champagne. (Build in glass like a classic Champagne Cocktail.)

name: My Sherry Amore
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Nelson's Blood No.2
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: New Orleans Gin Fizz
ingredients: ['2 1⁄4 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup) (2 sugar to 1 water)', '1⁄6 shot Orange flower/blossom water', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
steps:
1. Vigorously SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and pour back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass). TOP with soda from siphon.

ALTERNATIVELY, 2. Flash BLEND first seven ingredients without ice (to emulsify mix). Then pour contents of blender into shaker and SHAKE with ice. Strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass) and TOP with soda from siphon.

name: Oyster Bay
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Palmetto Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and stain into chilled glass.

name: Paloma (Simple)
garnish: Salt rim (optional) & pink or red grapefruit wedge
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '4 shot Thomas Henry Pink Grapefruit soda']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and gently stir.

name: Perfect Fairy
ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws.

name: Praline Pecan Pie
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Pecan liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Preakness Cocktail
garnish: Lemon zest twist discarded & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Raspberry Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Giffard Creme de Framboise', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 1/2 scoop (6oz) crushed ice and serve in chilled glass.

name: Rhubarb Lucca Negroni
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) and rhubarb stirrer
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Rabarbaro liqueur']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.

name: Rocky Left Bank
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1 1⁄3 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Royalist Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash Peach bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Ruby Gold
garnish: Float raspberry and dust with grated nutmeg
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Tawny port', '2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
steps: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients. Add ice, SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gin Sangaree (Sangre)
ingredients: ['2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Tawny port']
steps: SHAKE gin and sugar with ice and strain into chilled glass. Lastly POUR the port wine which will sink through drink and mix, leaving a thin clear layer at the top.

name: Smoked Appletini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Honey flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice. Smoke with apple and pecan (or other wood) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Stephen Marshall
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Teqroni
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: La Tour Eiffel
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Voyager Vodka Martini
garnish: Frozen green grape on stick (place on stick then freeze)
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Sake', '1⁄6 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Waldorf Daiquiri
garnish: A walnut, apple wedge and chunk of blue cheese on the side
ingredients: ['2 inch Celery stick (fresh)', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice']
steps: MUDDLE celery in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: William Porter
ingredients: ["1 2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Young Man Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Stout Fellow
ingredients: ['2 shot Stout beer', '1 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao']
steps: SHAKE (BEWARE - the stout may be explosive in your shaker so hold both ends more firmly than usual) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pale Charlie
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '3 shot Pale ale']
steps: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ale.

name: Huckle my buff
ingredients: ['1 fresh Egg yolk', '5 shot Harveys Porter 1859', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
steps: Gently BLEND all ingredients on a slow speed, then warm in a saucepan, gently stirring with a whisk (or microwave for 30 seconds and stir), POUR into warmed glass. If you make several servings in one batch, keep warm and serve from a sous-vide or heated soup kettle at to 60°C.

name: De Beauvoir
ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 3⁄4 shot Beavertown Smog Rocket Smoked Porter', '1 spoon Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '1 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Reality Check
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Rum barrel mug or pint glass
ingredients: ['5 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 3⁄4 shot Budweiser Budvar', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of large shaker tin. Add ice and other ingredients then THROW (strain from a height into a second strainer). Repeat four times and then strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Tomatini
ingredients: ['1 fresh Cherry tomato (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot White balsamic vinegar', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 pinch Black pepper']
steps: MUDDLE tomato in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Perfect Guest
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1 dash Celery bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Honey Vodka Collins
ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: STIR honey with vodka in base of shaker until honey dissolves. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Honey Cobbler
ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', "1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Claret red wine', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
steps: STIR honey with Scotch in base of shaker until honey dissolves. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Amber Nectar
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '2 spoon Honey', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR honey with scotch in base of shaker until honey dissolves. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Honey Bubble
garnish: Mint sprig in top of hulled strawberry
ingredients: ['5⁄12 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: STIR honey syrup with gin in glass until honey dissolves. Top with prosecco.

name: Trinidad Sour
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine stain into chilled glass.

name: Trinidad Especial
ingredients: ['1 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄3 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Elle Loves cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum (infused with vanilla)', '1 shot White Zinfandel rosé wine', '1 1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Ramos Chocolate Fizz cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄6 shot Orange flower/blossom water', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla extract', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first six ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne slowly poured into glass from a height to create thick foamy head.

name: Honey Bee Mine
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & honeycomb on rim
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄12 shot Vanilla extract', '1 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Gl'amour Cocktail
garnish: Edible flower or dried rose petals
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄12 shot Rose water', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine into chilled glass.

name: Sanguinello Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Blood orange juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Red Gemma
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 shot Shiraz red wine', '3 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne and gently stir.

name: Manky Panky Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '3⁄4 shot Shiraz red wine', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Blood orange juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Red Opal Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Blood orange liqueur', '1 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Orange flower/blossom water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blooded Knees Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '3⁄4 shot Blood orange juice', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (If using honey rather than honey syrup then use 3 spoons of honey.)

name: Sangre Dulce Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄4 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Succulent Blood
ingredients: ['2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄4 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', "1⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bloody Blood & Sand
ingredients: ["3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Blood orange juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Le Jardin
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '4 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Apple juice', "1 dash Bob's Lavender Bitters", '2 1⁄2 shot Rosé champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Rose Memoire
ingredients: ['2 spoon Redcurrant jelly', '1 shot Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)', '3 shot Rosé champagne']
steps: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Champagne Marguerite
garnish: Lemon wedge, edible flowers & seasonal berries
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Franco Russian Punch
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '2 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '4 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

name: Blood Orange Margarita
garnish: Half salt rim and blood orange slice
ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Whiskey Smash
ingredients: ['10 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Sicilian Orange Spritz
ingredients: ['3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '2 shot Blood orange liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR prosecco and liqueur into glass. ADD ice. Top with soda.

name: Fruit Cup Spritz
garnish: Half orange slice, lemon slice & mint sprig
ingredients: ['3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.

name: Biscotti Spritz
garnish: Biscotti biscuit across top of glass
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '5⁄6 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Butterscotch liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR prosecco and liqueurs into glass. ADD ice. Top with soda.

name: Lychee & Elderflower Spritz
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '5⁄6 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '5⁄6 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR prosecco and liqueurs into glass. Add ice and TOP with soda.

name: Parma Violet Spritz
garnish: Small pack of Parma Violet sweets
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '1 2⁄3 shot Crème de violette liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR prosecco and liqueur into glass. ADD ice. TOP with soda.

name: Peach & Apricot Spritz
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '5⁄6 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR prosecco and liqueurs into glass. ADD ice. Top with soda.

name: Raspberry Frangipane Spritz
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Giffard Creme de Framboise', '1⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄6 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄12 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: STIR 5 ingredients (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass, already charged with prosecco. TOP with soda.

name: Rossini Spritz
ingredients: ['3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Strawberry puree', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR prosecco and Rossini mix into glass. ADD ice. Top with soda.

name: Affogato Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with three cubes ice.

name: Berry Blast (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Passion fruit syrup', '2 shot Black tea (cold)', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Florence Fizz
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Elderflower cordial', '1 1⁄2 shot Pomegranate juice', '2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: POUR limoncello, lemon juice and elderflower cordial into glass. ADD crushed ice and LAYER pomegranate juice. ADD more crushed ice and TOP with prosecco.

name: Gennaro's Sidecar
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Temperance Ginger Mojito (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 wedge Lime (fresh)', '12 fresh Mint leaves', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: POUR first 2 ingredients into glass. ADD lime wedges (cut in half) & mint leaves. ADD crushed ice and CHURN (stir). TOP with soda and CHURN again.

name: Lemonade Spritz (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Jamie's Mojito
ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 wedge Lime (fresh)', '12 fresh Mint leaves', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: POUR first 4 ingredients into glass with lime wedges and mint. Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir). Fill glass with more crushed ice and TOP with Prosecco.

name: Flying Frenchman (Absinthe Espresso Martini)
ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bellini Peach Spritz
garnish: Lemon slice or fresh peach wedge
ingredients: ['3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '1 1⁄4 shot Peach purée', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.

name: Apple & Blackberry Spritz
ingredients: ['1 shot Soave wine', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Sour apple liqueur', '2 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass. ADD ice and TOP with prosecco.

name: Sour Cherry Spritz
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR prosecco and liqueurs into glass. Add ice. TOP with soda.

name: Refresher (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Elderflower cordial', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '5 shot Lemonade']
steps: POUR elderflower and lemon juice into glass. ADD crushed ice and cranberry juice. CHURN. ADD more crushed ice and TOP with lemonade. CHURN.

name: The Heritage
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Anise / aniseed syrup', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Singapore Sling (Dale DeGroff's recipe)
garnish: Pineapple slice and Luxardo maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Sling glass
Photographed in an UB Koto Collins 35cl
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Gimlet Cocktail (Charles H. Baker's 1939 recipe)
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Pimm's Spritz
ingredients: ['1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '1 shot Fruit cup liqueur', '1 shot Lemonade']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

name: Hi Life Spritz
garnish: Lime wedge squeezed and dropped in drink
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin (from freezer)', '1 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine (chilled)', '2⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water (chilled)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.

name: Dantes in Fernet
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '1 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1 dash Xocolatl mole bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: There It Is...
ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Blood orange juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Dead Parrot Colada
garnish: Small stuffed dead parrot that's passed on, no more, expired and gone to meet 'is maker, a stiff, bereft of life, rests in peace, pushing up the daisies, off the twig, kicked the bucket, shuffled off 'is mortal coil, run down the curtain and joined the bleedin' choir invisible. An ex-parrot. And preferably one with "lovely plumage".
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Akvavit / Aquavit', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Coconut water', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and serve with straws.

name: Pina Colada (Difford's recipe)
garnish: Parasol, pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '3 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "3⁄4 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: BLEND all ingredients with half scoop crushed ice and serve with paper straws.

name: Almond Pina Colada
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Ford Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Hot Gin Toddy
ingredients: ['2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Chilled water', '3 shot Boiling water']
steps: Place bar spoon in empty (ideally warmed glass). POUR all ingredients into glass and then STIR.

name: Añejo Old Fashioned
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup', "8 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
steps: STIR one shot of tequila with three ice cubes (dry to the touch frozen ice, not wet ice) in a glass. Add agave syrup and bitters and two more ice cubes. STIR some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the tequila. STIR some more, and if you have room, add more ice.

name: Mezcal Negroni
ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.

name: Fairy Sugar Mama
garnish: Lemon twist (discarded) & mint leaf pegged to rim
ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blanche Corpse Reviver
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot La Fée Absinthe Blanche', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Blanche Refresher
ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Absinthe Blanche', "1 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Drizzle Green Chartreuse all over the top of the drink.

name: Melon Ball
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', 'Top up with Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Cosmopolitan cocktail (Toby Cecchini's recipe)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bamboo Cocktail (Difford's 'Perfect' recipe)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bonaparte cocktail
ingredients: ['3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1 1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur']
steps: POUR chilled soda water into ice-filled glass. Add freshly brewed hot espresso coffee so it layers on the sparkling water. Lastly pour the Mandarin Napoleon liqueur (the tasty part of the Bonaparte) which will sink through the coffee layer, pulling the drink together while leaving the coffee’s crema on the surface.

name: Sazerac Cocktail (New Orleans style)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: Ice glass and set to one side. Separately, in another glass stir other ingredients with ice. Discard ice in the now chilled set aside glass and rinse with absinthe (or Herbsaint). Then strain drink into absinthe/Herbsaint washed glass.

name: Perfectly Straight Blood & Sand
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & skewered Luxardo Maraschino cherries
ingredients: ["1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Surf & Turf Cocktail

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Turf Club Cocktail (Kappeler's Recipe)

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Turf Club Cocktail (Johnson's recipe)
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Libbey Speakeasy Coupe 8.5oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe (omit for Cocktails Made Easy)']

name: Paddington Bear Martini cocktail

name: Bloody Negroni

name: Buttercup cocktail
garnish: The original recipe calls for a lemon zest twist but the lemon oils overpower the butterscotch. So if you use a slither of lemon skin on which to nestle a Werther's Original, don't express the lemon's oils over the drink. WARNING: Don't be tempted to use buttercup flowers as they are poisonous. They are also poisonous when eaten by livestock but their acrid taste and the blistering of the mouth they cause mean that animals don't tend to eat them. Interestingly, the toxins degrade when dried, so hay containing dried buttercups is safe for animals to eat.
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Caramel Toffee liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Beer on-the-rocks
ingredients: ['2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '2 shot British bitter ale']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Lemon Tart
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & half lemon or half lime wheel on rim
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. SHAKE again without ice (dry shake) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: English Marmalade
ingredients: ['4 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker so as to dissolve marmalade. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Manhattan Transfer
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Marvin's Last Word
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: La Poire des Benedictines
garnish: Pear wedge speared with cube of Roquefort cheese
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Webber Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: New York Minute
garnish: Lemon and orange zest (discarded) & three coffee beans floating on drink
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bermondsey Minute
garnish: Lemon & orange zest twists (discarded) and float 3 coffee beans
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Club Cocktail (Whitfield's recipe)

name: Club Cocktail (Difford's recipe)

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Atta Boy Cocktail

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Byrrh Special

steps: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Double Grape

steps: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Trident
ingredients: ['1 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1 shot Akvavit / Aquavit', '2 dash Peach bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Negroni and the Goat
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Chill Bill

name: Floradora

name: Entente Cordiale Cocktail

name: Smokey Boat

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Old Mill

Serve in a Coupe glass

name: Mediterranean Sour

steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

name: Tennessee Sour
ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Silent Seven
ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Red Dog Smash

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Jack's Godfather Highball
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Highball (max 10oz/300ml)
Photographed in an UB 1910 Water 8.5oz
ingredients: ['1 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2 1⁄2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola & Pepsi Cola)']

name: Strawberry Fields
garnish: Five drops of balsamic vinegar and a dusting of freshly ground black pepper
ingredients: ['2 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: MUDDLE strawberry in base of shaker. Add vodka, honey syrup, lemon juice and egg white and SHAKE with ice. Strain back into shaker, DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.

name: El Mediterraneo
garnish: Drip 5 drops of olive oil on top
ingredients: ['3 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (There’s no need to muddle basil if good ice and shake are used.)

ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄3 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '2⁄3 shot Clove & quince syrup (homemade)', '2 dash Orinoco bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Other Woman

ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]

name: Le Grand
