name: Islay Old Fashioned
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR whisky with three ice cubes (dry to the touch frozen ice, not wet ice) in a glass. Add sugar syrup, bitters and two more ice cubes. STIR some more and add another two ice cubes. STIR a bit more, and if you have room, add more ice.

name: Velvet Old Fashioned
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄4 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

name: Willi Wonka cocktail
garnish: White chocolate square and half strawberry
ingredients: ['2 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Monin White Chocolate syrup']
steps: Muddle strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Coco Milky Way cocktail
garnish: Lemon zest & slice of Milky Way chocolate bar
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄3 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Coconut sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and pour into glass.

name: Wet cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 pinch Cinnamon powder', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Spanish Eyes
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '3⁄4 shot Zoco Pacharan Navarro', '1⁄6 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Harvard cocktail #2
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Claudine cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Armagnac brandy', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bruised Pomegranate
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)", '3⁄4 shot Chilled water']
steps: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: To Be Oranged cocktail
garnish: Orange zest (discarded) & orange wedge on rim
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄4 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Greek Celery Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Celery juice (freshly extracted)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Med
ingredients: ['7 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Fresh Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 inch Cucumber (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pink Khaleesi
ingredients: ['1 spoon Pink peppercorns', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: MUDDLE peppercorns in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Night Vision
ingredients: ['1 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1 shot Carrot juice (freshly extracted)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with tonic water.

name: Réveillon Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB 1910 Old Fashioned 10.5oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Poire William liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', "4 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Gun Metal Blue cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Cosmopolis cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Greek Martini
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Ouzo 12']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Aristotle cocktail
ingredients: ['3 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Birch water', "4 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters"]
steps: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Woody cocktail
ingredients: ['3 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 shot Birch water', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', "8 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters"]
steps: MUDDLE mint in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Denny & Eleni
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 shot Birch water', "8 drop Bob's Liquorice bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Wood Sap & Sand cocktail
ingredients: ['2 fresh Mint leaves', "1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: South of Heaven cocktail
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Fernet liqueur', '3 dash Celery bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Ionian Spritz cocktail
ingredients: ['3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

name: Eccentrica Daiquiri
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Birch water', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Smoky Tears cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Mastiha Mojito
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more. Keep adding ice and churning until drink fills glass. Serve with straws.

name: Mastiha & Tonic
ingredients: ['2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '4 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

name: Mastiha Sour
ingredients: ['2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Fresh White Lady cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄24 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "4 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Minty Pentones cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', "4 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Malecon Cocktail
garnish: float chunk of block ice (or ice cube)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Ruby port', '1⁄3 shot Oloroso sherry', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Tommi's Cocktail
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Perfectly Paired cocktail
garnish: Dust with cinnamon & pear slice on rim
ingredients: ['1 shot Pear purée', '1 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Apple Black Royal
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sour apple liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', 'Top up with Rosé champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Black Jack
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "4 drop Bob's Liquorice bitters", '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Black Spring
ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 shot Nardini Amaro', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.

name: Byrrh Cocktail
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Canadian blended whisky', '1 1⁄3 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 1⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1 dash Peach bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Byrrh Cassis
ingredients: ['3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass in the following order and lightly stir.

name: Thuir Sour
ingredients: ['1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Copenhagen Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Le Fizz cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with chilled soda.

name: Cold Whisky Punch
ingredients: ['2 slice Lemon peel', "2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
steps: SPRAY lemon zest twists into shaker and drop in. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: London Sour
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Suzie Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Dried Meadow Flower
garnish: Lemon slice (& ideally a bouquet of edible flowers)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Brown Bomber cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in an UB Coley Coupe 1910 6oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Keyser Söze cocktail
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Sunny Disposition cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "1 dash Boker's bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Enrico Palazzo
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', "2 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into carbonator. CARBONATE and pour into chilled glass.

name: Zuzu's Petals cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Celery bitters']

name: Deshler Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '2 twist Orange peel', '1 twist Lemon peel']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Reggatta de Blanc
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB Koto Old Fashioned 30cl
ingredients: ['1 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Le Sang Et Sable
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Great Northern
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB Koto Old Fashioned 30cl
ingredients: ['2 shot Akvavit / Aquavit', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Foghorn Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE (or stir) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Reverse Vesper Martini
ingredients: ['1 shot Kina aromatised wine', '1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka']

name: La Vendangeuse
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & grapes on stick
ingredients: ['7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Border Hop
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup', '5 shot Boiling water']
steps: POUR all ingredients into warmed glass and stir.

name: Smokin' Paloma
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Pink Grapefruit soda']
steps: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with grapefruit soda.

name: Smokin' Hot Paloma
ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', "3⁄4 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Pink Grapefruit soda']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with grapefruit soda.

name: Andean Dusk cocktail
garnish: Drop cold red grape into drink
ingredients: ['3 fresh Red grapes (seedless)', '1 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Rosé champagne']
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Minty White Lady cocktail
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.

name: What's Up, Doc?
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Carrot juice (freshly extracted)', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Sailor's Swizzle
garnish: A few dashes Angostura bitters over ice cap crowned with lime zest strings
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Ruby port', '1⁄6 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick (or churn with a barspoon). Add more crushed ice to fill and SWIZZLE some more. Serve with straws.

name: Cloud 9
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Pablo à Paris cocktail
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Martinique V.S.O.P rum', '2⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Miss Moonshine
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bán Poitín', '2⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Rosemary sugar syrup (2:1)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Boozy Suzie
garnish: Pink grapefruit zest twist (discarded) & 3 spots of Peychaud's bitters drawn through foamy head
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Parle-vous Irish cocktail
garnish: Orange zest twist & freshly grated nutmeg
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. (Consider adding a chunk of ice to the glass.)

name: Gilbey Vintner's Punch
ingredients: ['1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Orange sherbet', '1 shot Stout beer']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully FLOAT stout.

name: Spicy Fifty
garnish: Fresh chilli on rim (warn drinker not to eat)
ingredients: ['2 slice Red jalapeño/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded & chopped (fine sliced)', '1 2⁄3 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Elderflower cordial', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey sugar syrup']
steps: MUDDLE chilli in base of SHAKER. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Salvatore Meets
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Batida
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '2 shot Coconut water', '1 shot Condensed milk', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Or alternatively, BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice.

name: Ironbound
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB 1910 Old Fashioned 10.5oz
ingredients: ['1 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Pearl Button
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '2⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 2⁄3 shot Lemonade']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade.

name: Popeye Sour
garnish: Float spinach leaf or peg to rim
ingredients: ['8 fresh Spinach leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: MUDDLE spinach in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Ambrosio Cup
ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '3⁄4 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Bison grass vodka', '3⁄4 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda water.

name: Mure & Lavender Batida
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '1 2⁄3 shot Coconut water', '1⁄2 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '6 fresh Blackberries']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and serve with straws.

name: Picotin
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Akvavit / Aquavit', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.

name: Brooklyn (perfect)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Brooklyn (Grohusko's original)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Sakura Martini
garnish: Fresh cherry blossom (or make do with an olive if out of season)
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄24 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Cornichon
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Lion's Tail
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Queen's Park Hotel Super Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '5 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Angel Wore Red
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '2 shot Peroni lager']
steps: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice. POUR beer into ice-filled glass and then strain stirred ingredients into glass and lightly stir.

name: Mr Simon
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 spoon Agave syrup']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Eastside Gimlet
ingredients: ['2 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add gin, lime juice, sugar syrup and mint, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with a splash of soda.

name: Gold Rush
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Paper Plane
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Michelangelo Coppa 225ml
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Amaro Nonino Quintessentia', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Great Chase
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir. (Rather than measuring what is around a barspoon of lemon juice, you may prefer to gently squeeze the lemon wedge garnish prior dropping into the drink.

name: Waterloo
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & float pickled almond
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Jägermeister']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Elder Fashion
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.

name: Division Bell
ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Greenpoint
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Joy Division
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Juliet & Romeo
garnish: Float 3 drops rose water, 3 drops Angostura bitters & mint leaf
ingredients: ['3 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 pinch Salt', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Medicina Latina
garnish: Candied ginger and spray of mezcal
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄6 shot Ginger sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Moon Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Naked & Famous
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Weeski Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: French 125 (French '75' with cognac)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add cognac, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir. (Consider pouring half the champagne into the glass first to help reduce foaming.)

name: The Saint
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Ginger sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Sidecar No. Blue
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hearn Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '4 dash Orinoco bitters', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Irish Maid
ingredients: ['2 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Family and Friends Barrel Sling
garnish: Orange zest twist, pineapple wedge & cherry
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Originally designed to be a barrel aged cocktail so consider making a large batch and maturing in cask, prior to stirring with ice and serving.

name: Cherry Mojito
ingredients: ['14 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of glass (just to bruise). Add the next 4 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice. TOP with soda, briefly churn and serve.

name: Cherry Sour Bourbon
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Cherry Ginger Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1 1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1 1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hot Cherry
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1 1⁄3 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1 dried Cinnamon stick', '1⁄3 shot Boiling water']
steps: POUR all ingredients into teapot. Add all ingredients except hot water into a teapot. Allow to rest for a while before serving.

name: Heering Negroni
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Affiliate
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Alcatraz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '3⁄4 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', "8 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Bennett Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bijou Cocktail (inspired by Lawlor's 1895 recipe)
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Blinker (Hawksmoor's Riff)
ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mediocre
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum (infused with vanilla)', '1 shot Mead', '1 1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', "1 dash Bob's Vanilla bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Nooner
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Maple syrup', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pinecone
ingredients: ['2 dried Clove', '1 1⁄2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Mead', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Pine liqueur']
steps: MUDDLE cloves in base of shaker to crush. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Roosevelt Cocktail #2
ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Black walnut bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Sunset Strip
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1 shot Giffard Pamplemousse liqueur', '1 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Ultima Palabra
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Well-fortified
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Moscatel', '1 1⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Bison grass vodka']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Santa Marta Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water', '1⁄6 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT spoon of kirsch eau de vie on surface of drink.

name: Carré Nouveau
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Tribute
ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3 1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SPRAY violet liqueur onto inside surface of glass and set aside. STIR cognac with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Savelberg
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄3 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Honey', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Sacred Martell
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

name: Pour Me Another
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Velours de France
garnish: Demerara sugar rim & lemon zest twist (discarded)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into a chilled glass.

name: Trade Winds
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Coconut water', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: History & Nobility
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Je suis l'Amour
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Élysée Treaty
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 twist Orange peel']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Indimenticabili Momenti (Unforgettable Moments)
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Moscatel', '1⁄6 shot Liquore Strega', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: L'esprit de l'escalier
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Absinthe vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (or in place of ice use cold over frozen river stones to chill to avoid dilution from ice).

name: The Cab
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP champagne.

name: Blue Nightcap
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 spoon Honey', '1 dash Black walnut bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Almond Atholl Brose
ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', "1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Oat milk / oatmeal water', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄3 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: STIR honey with Scotch in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fat Godfather
ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky (bacon fat washed)", '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
steps: Fat-wash a bottle of peaty Scotch whisky with smoky bacon fat. POUR the now clarified smoky bacon-flavoured Scotch and other ingredients into mixing glass, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Amaro-etti Biscotti
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2⁄3 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "8 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Mon Dernier Mot (My Last Word)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Banana Split
garnish: Lightly dust surface of drink with chocolate powder & banana chunk on rim
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', "2 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters", "2 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", '3⁄4 shot Banana tea', '1⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
steps: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Shake a sealed container of cream and carefully POUR over the back of a spoon to form a small white spot floating in the centre of the drink.

name: Velvet Roof
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Cranberry liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Black Diamond #2
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Art de Vivre (Art of Living)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "1 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Papa Noel
garnish: Cinnamon stick (& originally with a sugar rim)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: La Garde de Nuit (The Night's Watch)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '3⁄4 shot Mead', '1⁄6 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Southern Alliance
garnish: Orange zest twist & Luxardo maraschino cherries
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 spoon Balsamic vinegar of Modena', '1 dash Plum bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a large chunk of block ice).

name: Desire
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Lovelight
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain in ice-filled glass.

name: Queen Mary
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Izarra Green (Vert) liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Challenger Deep
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Antica Ricetta Barolo Chinato', '1 shot Bigallet China China Amer', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: L'Indochine
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lapsang Souchong tea liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Boston Bittahs bitters']
steps: STIR all the ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Rachel
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water and drizzle crème de cassis on surface of drink

name: Simple Softly
garnish: Mint, ginger slices & dehydrated lime wheel
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄6 shot Antica Ricetta Barolo Chinato', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with ginger beer.

name: 49th Parallel
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Celebration
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Parmenides
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '4 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Poire de Vivre
ingredients: ['1⁄2 candied Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Green ginger wine', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Rock of Sages
ingredients: ['3 whole Maraschino cherry (from jar in syrup)', '4 fresh Sage leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Vermouth di Torino', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 spoon Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries']
steps: MUDDLE cherries in base of shaker. Add sage leaves and lightly bruise with the muddler. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Comeback
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Maple shrub (1:1.2 cider vinegar to maple syrup)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Preserve Nippon
ingredients: ['1 fresh Shiso leaf', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: Gently MUDDLE shisho leaf in base of shaker (just to bruise), add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: A Rose By Any Other Name
garnish: Turkish Delight & grate dark chocolate over drink
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Rose petal liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Crème de violette liqueur', "3 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Revolutionary Flip
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 1⁄3 shot British bitter ale', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Seventh Son
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rose sugar syrup', 'Top up with Budweiser Budvar']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Carefully pour beer to FLOAT on top of drink.

name: DaVinci Code
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄6 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Salted Caramel Syrup']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Winter Clove
garnish: Orange zest twist with a flamed clove
ingredients: ['3 whole Clove', '1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "3 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The French Canadian
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Michelangelo Coppa 225ml
ingredients: ['1 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: C'est la Vie (That's Life)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Devil In Me
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄3 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Akashi-Tai Shiraume Ginjo Umeshu', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "1 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: L'Anniversaire (The Birthday)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Raisin sugar syrup (2:1 homemade)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Excuse My French
garnish: Lemon zest encircling the inside rim of glass with crusted sugar coated rim.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Creme de Framboise', "1 spoon Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Cheshire Cat
garnish: Lemon zest twist, rosemary sprig & smouldering cinnamon stick
ingredients: ['1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
steps: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of ice block).

name: Quitting Ordinary
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 spoon Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Le Commercant (The Merchant)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

name: Good Afternoon
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1 1⁄3 shot Tea - strong white tea (cold)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled tea cup.

name: Homely Smoke
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 spoon Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Late Night
garnish: Dust with grated tonka beans & dried rose petals
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Poire William liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Oloroso sherry', "3 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fedora Sour
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Peach bitters', '1 dash Black walnut bitters', '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sunny Side Up
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄3 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Rhubarb bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Butler's Tipple
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
Photographed in an UB Nick And Nora 1920
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: A Few of My Favourite Things
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Continental Exchange
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Akashi-Tai Shiraume Ginjo Umeshu', '5⁄6 shot Apple juice', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Ginger sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Heather honey']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: French Dew Sour
ingredients: ['1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '2 grind Black pepper', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 dash Vanilla extract']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Red Head
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois', '1⁄6 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Berry Flip
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1 2⁄3 shot Green ginger wine', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: French Riviera
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 spoon Apricot jam (preserve)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Pleasure to Tell
garnish: Orange zest twist & Luxardo maraschino cherry sprayed with chocolate bitters
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Cherry Velvet
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Vermouth amaro (e.g. Cardamaro)', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Thyme for…
ingredients: ['1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 sprig Thyme sprig', '1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth']
steps: DASH bitters over sugar cube in stirring glass and MUDDLE cube to crush. ADD other ingredients and stir to dissolve sugar. Add ice and STIR. Fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Sun King
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄3 shot Crème de figue', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 drop Orange flower/blossom water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Cordial Inviter
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Entente Cordiale #2
garnish: Dash of Angostura Bitters drawn across foam
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Tea syrup (Breakfast tea) 2:1)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: Dry shake all ingredients together, then shake vigorously with cubed ice and double strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Night Cap
ingredients: ['1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1⁄2 shot Hot water', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
steps: Dash bitters over sugar cube in base of mixing glass. Add hot water, crush cube with muddler and stir to dissolve sugar. Add cognac, STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Le Traite des Pyrenees (The Treaty of the Pyrenees)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Peach bitters']
steps: SMOKE the inside of glass with a lightly fragrant cigar and cover. STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into cigar smoked glass.

name: Thin Pink Line
garnish: Slowly pour 2 spoons (10ml) Peychaud's bitters onto a spot in the centre of the drink. After about a minute or so, a 'Thin Pink Line' of bitters develops below the foam.
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Velvet Seine
garnish: Spot 2 drops of Angostura bitters on surface of drink
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Derniere Minute (Last Minute)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Beloved
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Mozart Chocolate Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", "1 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: L'apocalypse Ultime (The ultimate Apocalypse)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', "1⁄3 shot L'Esprit De June Liqueur", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", "2 dash Boker's bitters", 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne

name: B&B Royale
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Three Hundred Poems
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 spoon Blackcurrant jam (preserve)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Early Evening Fizz
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discard) Lemon wedge & Luxardo maraschino cherry.
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 pinch Salt', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass). POUR soda into drink slowly from a height in order to build a (Ramos Gin Fizz style) thick foamy head. Serve with a straw.

name: Charentes Cocktail
ingredients: ['7 whole Green grapes (seedless)', '1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Pineau des Charentes rouge', "3 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: MUDDLE grapes in base of mixing glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Charentes
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Pineau des Charentes rouge', '1⁄3 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: MGM Grand
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Titre Provisoire (Provisional Title)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Crème de figue', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash Apple Cider vinegar']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Palace of Versailles
ingredients: ['3 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Sauvignon blanc wine']
steps: SLAP basil to express oils. STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Brandy Club Cocktail
garnish: Orange & lemon grated zest mixed with caster sugar rim
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Chocolat a l'orange (Orange Chocolate)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', "5⁄6 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1 whole Cinnamon stick', '1 fresh Orange peel']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a large brandy balloon over a chunk of block ice.

name: Bon Accord
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Lillet Rouge', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Addington
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "1 dash Boker's bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: French Kiss #3
ingredients: ['5 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Grape Expectations
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Rose petal liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into glass with two-thirds crushed ice and SWIZZLE. Top with crushed ice and serve with a straw.

name: Le Chateau
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Polar Express
garnish: Grated meringue & pinch edible charcoal powder
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot White chocolate grappa liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice over a scoop of fior di latte (vanilla) ice-cream.

name: The Fig Easy
ingredients: ['1 whole Figs', '1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Honey']
steps: Scoop out the soft inner flesh of fig into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass

name: Sainte Trinite (Holy Trinity)

steps: Stir first two ingredients with ice, strain into chilled glass and top with tonic.

name: Apairoteef
garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Confectionery dentures dropped into glass
ingredients: ['1 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (without ice). (Note the sparkling wine should be flat.)

*Special ingredient #1 = Cardamom & Pear Shrub made as follows:
400ml Merlet pare
300ml Gewürztraminer, Germain.
7g Cardamom pods
5ml Vanilla curd
75ml White balsamic
10g Citric acid
10g Tartaric acid
150g Caster sugar
100g Water
Blend for 5 minutes and super strain.

name: Yuliya Martini
garnish: Grapefruit zest twist & drop eucalyptus oil
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Floral Daiquiri
garnish: Sprig of dried lavender pegged to rim
ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '3 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur']
steps: Rinse chilled glass with violet liqueur and set aside ready for drink. MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into rinsed glass.

name: Farmer's Tan
garnish: Place cocktail stick in glass and drop chilli oil on surface of drink where stick break's meniscus so that the chilli oil is speared by the stick.
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
