steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Brooklyn's Finest
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Vermouth amaro (e.g. Cardamaro)', "1⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Sleepy Smoker
ingredients: ['1 shot Oak Smoked Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Colleen Bawn
garnish: Dust with freshly grated cinnamon & nutmeg
ingredients: ['1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)', '3⁄4 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: BEAT egg and pour into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.

name: Eight Foot Fizz
garnish: Mint sprigs, dried citrus fruit wheels, cinnamon stick and red amaranth leaves, dusted with icing sugar. Place at least 5 pretzels over straw.
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1 shot Kiwi fruit puree', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water poured from a height to create a frothy head. Serve with straws.

Special ingredient #1 = Lemon sherbet
Blend the following for a couple minutes and fine strain
600g Caster sugar
600g Super strained lemon juice
20g Lemon zest (removed from fruit with Microplane grater)
5g Maldon sea salt

Special ingredient #2 = Rose water & kiwi syrup
Blend the following and bottle
5g malic acid
100ml Catron kiwi liqueur
100ml Merlet pear liqueur
100ml Money musk coconut
25ml Absinthe
5g Maldon sea salt
100ml Orgeat syrup
50ml Campari
200ml Sugar syrup (1:1)

name: Instaspam
garnish: Serve in a Spam tin and place tub of ice cream with small spoon on top of tin and rest straw across top.
ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Cranberry & morello cherry puree', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
POUR all ingredients into tin, add ice and churn with spoon.

Special ingredient #1 = Hazelnut & orange blossom syrup
Blend the following and super fine strain.
15g Citric acid
7ml Orange blossom water
275g Caster sugar
120ml Hazelnut liqueur
4 Cardamom pods
5g Maldon sea salt
5ml Vanilla curd
120ml Benedictine
275g Water

name: Patrón City Lights
ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Ginseng aperitif', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and TOP with soda.

Nathan uses salted Peychaud's Bitters which he makes with Maldon salt (10g of Maldon salt to one bottle of Peychaud's Bitters).

name: Patrón Chipotle Punch
garnish: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '2 spoon Chilpotle oleo-saccharum', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']

name: Patrón Señor Sling

steps: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and lightly stir.

name: Patrónomy
garnish: Rim glass with black salt. Grapefruit zest twist
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '5⁄6 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '2 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 drop *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR briefly.

Special Ingredient #1: Gentain eau-de-vie

name: Mexica
garnish:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special Ingredient #1: Homemade dill syrup
Add 160 grams of dill to 1 litre sugar syrup. Allow to infuse for at least 24 hours, strain and bottle.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)', '1 pinch Salt']
steps: Read about cocktail measures and measuring.

name: Patrón Yellow Submarine
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 1⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '4 drop *Special ingredient #3 (see above)']
steps:
Special Ingredient #1 - Yellow Juice
2 part yellow beetroot to 1 part yellow bell pepper and 1 part yellow tomato

Special Ingredient #2 - Pepper Falernum
1 chile de arbol
1 jalapeno
1 bottle Velvet Falernum

Coarsely chop 1 chile de arbol and 1 jalapeno and infuse with a bottle of velvet falernum for 3 days. Strain and re-bottle.

Special Ingredient #3 - Pink Saline Solution
Combine 5 parts water to 1 part Himalayan pink salt. Stir to dissolve and store in a dropper bottle.

Rim a rocks glass with fine ground dried parsley and Himalayan salt. ADD all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker, SHAKE vigorously with ice and STRAIN into the glass with ice. Garnish with yellow beet pickles.

name: Mercado Roma
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 spoon *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice).

Special Ingredient #1: Pineapple Ancho Shrub
Blend equal parts pineapple juice and sugar and leave to rest for 2 hours. Add equal parts white wine vinegar and leave for 24 hours. Then add a teaspoon of chipotle sauce and blend.

Special Ingredient #2: Clove Honey
Add equal parts honey, water and a handful of cloves to a pot and heat at 180˚C for 25 minutes stirring constantly.

name: Hotel Georgia Cocktail
garnish: Orange zest twist &/or dust with freshly grated nutmeg

name: Carousel
garnish: Chocolate powder or melted dark chocolate rim
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 pinch Salt']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Dulce de leche (30ml is approx. 5 bar spoons)

name: Te Anaka
garnish: Sea salt and lemon spritz with a dehydrated lemon wheel
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Honey water (1:1)', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.

name: Companion
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 pinch Black pepper', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 spoon Pear purée', '1⁄2 shot Honey', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: MUDDLE peppercorns in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Guest

name: Kawahori

name: El Ritmo

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably block ice). TOP up with beer.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

steps: MUDDLE lime and basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Turning Leaves
ingredients: ['15 fresh Oregano leaves', '1 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: MUDDLE oregano and cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Lachlan's Antiscorbutic
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Creme de Framboise', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄12 shot Pickled cucumber/gherkin brine/vinegar']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Sweet Manhattan (batched recipe)
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry
ingredients: ['10 shot Bourbon whiskey', '10 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '10 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "1⁄6 shot Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps:
Combine all ingredients and stir (without ice). POUR into a litre bottle and leave to chill in a refrigerator. To serve, STIR 2 shots / 2oz / 60ml of the bottled mixture with ice and strain into chilled glass. Makes 16 drinks.

This recipe is also perfect for making a barrel aged Manhattan and will fill a one litre mini cask. Obviously, multiply recipe if using a larger cask.

name: When The Smoke Cleared
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄4 shot Ginger sugar syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (Also works well strainer over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Pickle Whack Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '1 pinch *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Pickle Salt
- 500g Fine Sea Salt
- 20ml Pickle Juice
Add pickle juice to salt, break up any lumps, store in Kilner jar.

name: Picasso Sour
garnish: Spray Angostura Bitters through stencil or drip a few drops on surface foam.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '4 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Grappa Espresso Martini
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Muscovado sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Geisha Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Japanese blended whisky', '1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: A Dream to Be
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '3 dash Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Friend of Jack
garnish: Cone filled with roasted & salted walnuts pegged to rim (roast walnuts with sea salt in pan for about 15/20 min on low heat)
ingredients: ['1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #3 (see above)', '1⁄6 shot Blood orange liqueur', '2 dash Fernet liqueur']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Duck fat washed Jack Daniel’s Old No. 7
Pour bottle of Jack Daniel’s into pan with 200g duck fat. Cook on low heat until duck fat melted. Allow to cool enough to pour into a sealable container and then freeze. This will allow the duck fat to be strained out of the whiskey. Return the duck fat washed whiskey to bottle for use.

Special ingredient #2: Pear & Honey Posca
Skin 5 pears and cook with bottle of white wine and ½ cup of honey until pears become translucent. Strain throw coffee filter and bottle ready for use.

Special ingredient #3: Tansy & pisco tincture
Infuse 200ml pisco with 5 soup spoons of tansy for 3 days or cook for 3 hours/55˚C in water bath. Strain through coffee filter and the tincture is ready to use.

name: A Modern Day Jack
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade salted caramel sauce
3 parts demerara sugar to 1 part double cream with a pinch of sea salt. Heat sugar until it has become liquid and started to caramalise, separately heat the double cream till warm, then add cream to the sugar and stir until golden brown and the sugar has completely dissolved. Add your salt and stir further. Allow to cool at room temperature (if you put it in the fridge it will become too solid to mix).

name: The Usual
ingredients: ['1 5⁄6 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Orange peel infused Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato

Special ingredient #2: Cherry balsamic & cola reduction shrub at 4:3 ratio

name: The Ballad of Cat Ballou
garnish: Edible flowers & dehydrated peach dust. Drink should be accompanied by an antomiser of homemade edible rose & peach perfume
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '5⁄12 shot Vermouth di Torino', '1 1⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade Peach and clove liqueur
Roast peach stones (that are left over by the kitchen) and add with cloves to a combination of overproof white rum and high proof vodka and leave to infuse for 36 hours. Separately, made a peach iced tea from teabags cold infused for 24 hours. Blend the two infusions together with sugar and peach juice.

name: Full Circle (by Ryan Mowat)
ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Palo cortado sherry', '3 fresh Fresh dill', '1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Peach aperitif liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: Rinse chilled glass with sherry and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-rinsed glass.

name: The Vine & The Fig Tree
garnish: Sage leaves, dehydrated fig slice & lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps:
DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients and strain back into shaker. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Fig and sage syrup
Pour 1 litre water into a pan with 2 packets (100g each pack) of dried figs and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, add 1.4kg sugar and stir to make a syrup. Take off heat and add two stems worth of sage leaves. Leave to stew and stir occasionally. Once cooled, strain off the figs and leaves and bottle. Store in a refrigerator prior to use.

name: Jack Rising
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 2⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
steps:
Spritz a chilled glass with Islay whisky (Kaiko used Laphroaig) and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into spritzed glass.

Special ingredient #1: Rejuvenated grenadine
* Rejuvenated grenadine
300g pomegranate juice
150g granulated sugar
30g maraska syrup (from jar of maraschino cherries)
60g beet vinegar (from jar of pickled beetroot)
60g oxidised grenache red wine
1 barspoon rosewater
¼ vanilla pod
4 pinch ground allspice (~1g)
6g carob molasses
Place all ingredients in a jar and shake until the sugar is dissolved. Remove the vanilla pod after approx 1hr.

Special ingredient #2: Citric lime oleo-saccharum
100ml 1:1 lime oleo
10ml 10% citric acid solution

name: Clever Jasper's Tea
garnish: Lemon verbena sprig & stick of lemon grass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer', '1 shot Chilled water']
steps:
POUR all ingredients into a soda syphon. Charge with CO2 and thoroughly before dispensing into glass filled with ice made with water infused with kaffir lime leaf and ginger.

Special ingredient #1: Lemon juice clarified with Agar-Agar

Special ingredient #2: Lemon grass infused syrup

name: The Sunday Session
ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', "1 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1 whole Egg (white & yolk)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Cocchi de Torino infused with salted maple walnuts
Mix 250g walnuts, 200ml pure maple syrup and 10g rock salt and leave to soak for 3 hours. Add 500ml Cocchi de Torino, mix and leave to sit in a sealed container for 4 days, shaking each day. Filter with a coffee filter and bottle. Dehydrate the left over walnuts to use for garnish.

Special ingredient #2: Vanilla infused Colombian coffee syrup

name: Heather Crowe
garnish: Smoke the drink with applewood and seal jar. Open jar when serving to guest.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 whole Egg (white & yolk)']
steps:
DRY SHAKE all ingredients and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into small jar.

Special ingredient #1: Benriach (peated) single malt Scotch whisky

Special ingredient #2: Heather ale syrup (1:1 ratio)

name: Harvest Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 1⁄2 shot Vermouth amaro (e.g. Cardamaro)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Carlton Banks
ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "2 drop Boker's bitters", '1 1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Top with chilled champagne.

name: Root 56
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Jägermeister', '4 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and gently STIR.

name: Prohibition Daisy (Alcohol-free*)
ingredients: ['1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN drink and serve with straws.

name: Daisy de Santiago
garnish: Seasonal berries & mint sprig dusted with icing sugar or lime wheel (preferably dehydrated)
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. DRIZZLE a spoon of Chartreuse over top of drink.

name: Sake Manhattan
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Sake', '3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]

Spicy sugar syrup
To make your own festive spice syrup: Stir half a cup of hot water and half a cup of sugar in a pan until sugar is dissolved. Add 1 cracked cinnamon stick, ½ a split vanilla pod and 1 teaspoon of cracked Szechuan peppers. Cover for 15 minutes then strain and cool liquid. If using this syrup in the recipe below then use 12.5ml.

name: Estrella Porno Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Passoã liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps:
1. To make a Estrella Porno Martini you’ll first need to flavour your tequila with a vanilla pod. Simply cut the vanilla pod lengthways to expose the flavoursome seeds inside and drop the whole vanilla pod into your bottle of tequila. Reseal and shake bottle several times a day for at least two days, preferably a week.

2. To make your cocktail, wash and cut passion fruits in half, SCOOP out the seeds and flesh of 3 halves into shaker. (Keep last passion fruit half for garnish). Add next four ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. POUR champagne into chilled shot glass to serve on the side. Instruct drinker to sip alternately from each glass.

garnish: Coat rim of glass with chocolate – use a microwave to melt a few squares of dark chocolate in a saucer and then and dip the rim of the glass into the melted chocolate. It's easier to cut the chocolate egg when straight from the refrigerator (a good test for how sharp your knife is). Spear the egg with a metal cocktail stick that has been heated in hot water.

name: Old Hickory (Britten's recipe)

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Blueberry Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '10 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add blueberries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

name: Strawberry & Basil Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons powdered caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add strawberries and basil, and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Using an Ice Tapper, crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄3 shot Pomegranate juice', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with prosecco.

name: Electric Avenue
ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 1⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Ruby port']
steps: POUR first 4 ingredients into ice-filled glass and CHURN to mix. TOP with port.

name: Madame Lily
garnish: Lime zest twist & edible white flower
ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄4 fresh Apple (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: RINSE glass with absinthe and set aside. MUDDLE apple and sugar syrup in base of shaker. Add rum, calvados and lime juice, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into absinthe rinsed chilled glass.

name: Elixir Tropical
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 fresh Mint leaves']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mariel
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Coconut water', '1⁄3 shot Honey', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Unión
garnish: Sugarcane leaves & citrus salt rim (dehydrated peel of 3 lemons and 2 oranges, ground with 100g salt and 30g icing sugar)
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Liquore Strega']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Big Fish
garnish: Maraschino cherry on cocktail stick & 2 bay leaves
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄12 shot Sherry vinegar']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Earl Grey syrup made with 20g Dilmah Earl Grey tea, 1l boiling water and 600g caster sugar.

name: Admiral's Salute
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Peach bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Cuban Pete
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Copita sherry glass
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Coconut water', '8 fresh Mint leaves']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Rain or Shine
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Carrot juice (freshly extracted)', '1⁄2 shot Guava juice', '1⁄2 shot Green mint (menthe verte) syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Celebration (by Grzegorz Nowicki)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps:
STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass TOP with prosecco.

*Special ingredient #1: Pineapple cordial made by blending 900g of pineapple flesh with 450g of simple syrup (1:1.5) and straining through a cheesecloth; add 4g tartaric acid.

name: Flight 1862
garnish: Black pepper, orange zest twist, maraschino cherry & paper aeroplane
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot Egg white', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Port wine & sweet vermouth reduction made with 3 parts port wine and 1 part sweet vermouth, cook for 12 minutes on an induction hob or 18 minutes on a conventional hob with 2 cinnamon sticks.

name: Solaris
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Sorrel water made by blending 100g sorrel with 70ml water, fine strain.

name: Marshall
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', '2 pinch Black pepper']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: El Luchador
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Thyme syrup made infusing 20-30g fresh thyme with 1 litre hot water for around 10 mins, then mixed with 1 kg white sugar.

name: Gonzo
ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Amontillado sherry', "2 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '4 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

name: Memento
ingredients: ['3 slice Banana (overripe)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps:
MUDDLE banana with lime juice in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: * Salted peanut butter syrup made by adding 2 heaped tablespoons of fine sea salt to a bottle of Monin Peanut Butter Syrup. Shake well until the salt has dissolved.

name: Apóstol
ingredients: ['3 pinch Cinnamon powder', '1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao']
steps: FLAME cinnamon powder on a suitable surface and upend snifter glass over smoking cinnamon and leave to capture smoke while mixing ingredients. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into cinnamon smoked glass.

name: La Blanca
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Egg white', '1⁄3 spoon Extra virgin olive oil']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Tomato and vanilla syrup made by heating 200ml tomato water with 200g sugar. Cool, then add 100ml vanilla syrup

name: Efe
ingredients: ['1 5⁄6 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄2 spoon *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '4 dash *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '2 drop Hazelnut oil']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Cola reduction with lime – made by reducing 2,500ml cola down to 30ml. Add 40g lime peel whilst cooling, strain and bottle.

*Special ingredient #2: Maple liquor - 50ml bourbon, 15ml maple syrup, 30ml water; stir until dissolved.

name: Pilar
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Peach aperitif liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple sugar syrup', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '5⁄6 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Something Tasty
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Yuzu juice', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: It Was All A Dream
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Passionfruit condensed milk – made by combining 355ml of passionfruit puree, 355ml of granulated sugar and 240ml Carnation evaporated milk.

name: Playa Fortuna
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "1⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '4 drop *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Coconut cordial – made with equal parts by weight coconut water and white sugar.

*Special ingredient #2: Tartaric acid – made with 1 part cream of tartar and 5 parts water by weight.

name: Showgirl Cocktail
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Rose petal liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '3 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Blushing Mimosa
ingredients: ['3 shot Brut Champagne', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: POUR half the champagne into chilled glass, then orange juice, pineapple juice and the rest of the champagne. Finally pour pomegranate syrup/grenadine in to glass and allow to sink through cocktail.

name: Blackberry Agave Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '6 fresh Blackberries', '1 shot Agave syrup', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass and MUDDLE.

2. Add blackberries and MUDDLE some more.

3. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

4. Add agave syrup to serving glass.

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

name: The Joanna
garnish: Small lavender sprigs pegged to rim
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', "6 drop Bob's Lavender Bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Dutch Sour
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 fresh Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Embrasse de la Terre
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3 dash Celery bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Pomegranate Daiquiri
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Retro Coupe Engraved 7.75oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Pomegranate juice', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Scandinavian Daiquiri
ingredients: ['2 shot Akvavit / Aquavit', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with and strain into chilled glass.

name: Courtside
garnish: Top with berries and mint sprig
ingredients: ['1 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: MUDDLE berries in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients (all but soda), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Sherry Herbst
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', "1⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Oloroso sherry']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: French Kiwi & Apple Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1⁄2 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '1⁄6 shot Pernod anise', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add Kiwi fruit and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. Add apple juice and anis liqueur, then STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

name: Watermelon Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '1⁄2 cupful Watermelon (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add watermelon and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

steps: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.

name: Aged Rum Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.14)
garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola & Pepsi Cola)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.

name: Bourbon Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.15)
garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bourbon whiskey', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola & Pepsi Cola)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.

name: Tennessee Whiskey Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.17)
garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage
ingredients: ['1 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola & Pepsi Cola)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.

name: Pineapple Martini (1990s recipe)
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pineapple Martini (Difford's recipe)
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 drop Tiki bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pineapple Daiquiri (Difford's recipe)
ingredients: ['1 shot Pineapple rum', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gin & IT (Rosolio recipe)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: IPAlicus
ingredients: ['1 shot Italicus liqueur', '4 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

name: Negroni Bianco Bergamotto
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italicus liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Caribbean Colada
garnish: Pineapple, Luxardo Maraschino cherry & paper parasol
ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Coconut sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Tropical Pineapple Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass.

name: Stiletto Manhattan
garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick
ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Rhubarb Negroni
ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rabarbaro liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Paisley Spritz
ingredients: ['2 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine', '1 shot Drambuie liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

name: Le Sang Jaune (The Yellow Blood)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain to ice-filled glass.

name: Czechmate
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 shot Budweiser Budvar']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with pilsner.

name: Shadow Boxer
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Pamplemousse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Apricot (abricot) eau-de-vie']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

name: Gallicus
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur', '3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Montreal Cocktail (official city cocktail)
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Canadian rye whisky', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Soixante-Quinze (Washington Herald 1915 recipe)
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Applejack brandy bottled-in-bond (50% alc./vol)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: French 75 (Judge Jr's 1927 recipe)
ingredients: ['1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add gin, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

name: French 95 (a French '75' with bourbon)
ingredients: ['1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add bourbon, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

name: Coffee Coolatta
garnish: Float white tea & coconut foam (make foam using cream whipper with equal parts brewed cold white tea and coconut milk with egg white as protein)
ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Cold brew coffee']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Schnitzelburg
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Vermouth amaro (e.g. Cardamaro)', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Waysider
ingredients: ['5 fresh Mint leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

name: Limoncello Spritz
ingredients: ['1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

name: PLB
ingredients: ['1⁄4 fresh Lemon (fresh) (chopped)', '1 1⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: MUDDLE lemon in base of a sturdy rocks glass and then pour into serving glass. Fill glass with ice, add limoncello and bitters. TOP with tonic and lightly stir.

name: Lemon Sherbet Margarita
garnish: Float lemon sorbet balls (made with melon baller)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '1 scoop Lemon sorbet']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Brazuca Remedy
garnish: Lemon zest twist & float basil leaf
ingredients: ['3 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça', '2⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Renaissance
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Peach bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Spiked Arnold Palmer
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '4 shot Black tea (cold)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Black Basil
ingredients: ['8 fresh Basil leaves', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add next 4 ingredients (all but tonic water), SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water and lightly stir.

name: Nobile Cocktail
garnish: Lemon slice, mint sprig, raspberry & blackberry
ingredients: ['8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Bitter Lemon']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add next four ingredients (all but bitter lemon), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with bitter lemon and lightly stir.

name: Yo Ho
ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Bitter Lemon']
steps: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with bitter lemon.

name: Red Earl
ingredients: ['10 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: DMC
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into glass filled with crushed ice and churn (stir).

name: French 125 (French '75' with cognac) Jones' 1977 recipe
ingredients: ['1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add cognac, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

name: French 75 (Difford's recipe)
ingredients: ['1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1⁄2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add next 5 ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir. (Consider pouring half the champagne into the glass first to help reduce foaming and eliminate need to stir.)

name: Biblical Quartet
garnish: Apple slice or dehydrated apple slice
ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Ice cider', '1 shot Apple juice', '1 shot Medium dry apple cider']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with dry cider.

name: Flat White Martini
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Alternatini
ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄6 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄12 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Old Friend
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pineapple Sour
garnish: Pineapple wedge or dehydrated pineapple slice
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Pineapple Daiquiri (simple but tasty recipe)
ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Archibald's Last Memory Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB Koto Old Fashioned 30cl
ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice).

name: Fin de Siècle (End of Century) Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
Photographed in an UB Nick and Nora Gold 6oz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Amer Picon', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Beginning of the End
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄3 shot Oloroso sherry']
steps: FLAME an orange zest twist into empty glass to line the inside with smoky oils. Then STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into the pre-prepared glass.

name: Mirror Match
ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 dash Jerry Thomas bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Merry Widow Fizz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1⁄2 fresh Pasteurised egg white', '3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice). TOP with soda.

name: Sex On The Beach
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)']
steps: SHAKE first three ingredients (the 'beach' part) with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Then SHAKE the last three ingredients (the 'sex' part) with ice and strain into glass to sit on top of the 'beach' base layer. Serve with stirrer and instruct drinker to mix layers together before drinking.

name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against a Cold Hard Wall
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄4 shot White overproof rum']
steps: STIR first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Then FLOAT Galliano and overproof rum.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against a Cold Hard Wall With a Kiss
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄4 shot White overproof rum']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Then FLOAT amaretto so it bleeds into drink. Finish with a FLOAT of Galliano and overproof rum.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall With A Bang
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
steps: STIR first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Finish with a FLOAT of Galliano.

name: Slow Comfortable Mexican Screw Against the Wall
ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
steps: STIR first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT sloe gin on surface so it bleeds into drink. Finish with Galliano FLOAT.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw Between the Sheets
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Slow Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT sloe gin on surface so it bleeds into drink. Finish with Galliano FLOAT.

name: Alabama Slammer (long)
ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Don't be tempted to shake as this detrimentally thins the drink. Instead, consider rolling or throwing.)

name: Alabama Slammer (shot)
garnish: Split Luxardo Maraschino cherry on rim
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hairy Navel
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Don't be tempted to shake as this detrimentally thins the drink. Instead, consider rolling or throwing.)

name: Gin Tonica
garnish: Lemon zest twist, lime wedge & 3 cardamom pods
ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

name: Red Earl (Salvatore's recipe)
ingredients: ['1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '10 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup) (optional)']
steps: MUDDLE ginger and then raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Koko Colada
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 1⁄4 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Vodka Soda
ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir (so as not to lose fizz). Don’t serve with straws.

name: Contrasting Faces
garnish: Warm vanilla & orange foam, freshly grated nutmeg
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Rosato/rosé vermouth', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "3 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Salted pineapple cordial

name: Intimacy
garnish: Pernod or absinthe, 2 lemon zests & 1 pink grapefruit zest
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "1⁄12 shot Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice).

Special ingredient #1: Rum 21 years old

name: Mon Ami
ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
Method: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

Special ingredient #1: Pineapple & celery soda

name: The Compass Rose
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Mandarin soda']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Bon Vivant
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Mandarin soda']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

name: Battement
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Jasmine sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Plum bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Coeur de Pirate
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Poppy liqueur, Islay whisky and triple sec sous vide for 1 hour with 80gr of fresh pineapple.

name: Green As Grass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄6 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '3 dash Celery bitters']
steps: POUR ingredients into glass half-filled with crushed ice and SWIZZLE. Fill glass with more crushed ice.

name: Psycho Killer Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient: Cocoa nib-infused Campari
Add 2 tablespoons of cocoa nibs to one 70cl or 75cl bottle Campari. Let infuse for one hour and then strain to remove cocoa nibs. Pour back into bottle and mark bottle accordingly.

serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Jersey's Best Dancers

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over block ice).

name: Whisky Mac Toddy

steps: POUR ingredients into pre-heated glass.

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Mexican Duchess

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Dutch Orange Cup

steps: POUR all ingredients into glass half filled with ice. Add an orange slice and a couple of mint leaves from the garnish before filling to the brim with more ice and rest of garnish.

name: Dutch Tea Cocktail

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Crown with crushed ice.

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Del Famoso (The Famous)

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Napoléon Margarita

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Queen's Steeple
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass
Photographed in a Waterford Mixology Coupe Clear

steps: Read about cocktail measures and measuring.

name: Grassoide Ferro Cocktail
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Ferro China Baliva', '1 1⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Boston Sour

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Haiti Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass

steps: SHAKE all ingredient with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Windfall
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Birch spirit/birch eau-de-vie', '1⁄3 shot Armagnac brandy', '1 2⁄3 shot Apple juice']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Beelzebub
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Am I Blue?
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Birch spirit/birch eau-de-vie', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 2⁄3 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with pale ale and briefly stir.

name: Sage Sazerac
ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Ricard Pastis', '3 fresh Sage leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Birch spirit/birch eau-de-vie', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: Rinse chilled glass Pastis and set aside. MUDDLE sage in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into the pre-rinsed glass over fresh ice (preferably a chunk of block ice).

name: Bermuda Triangle
ingredients: ['1 shot Batavia arrack', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 spoon Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Pimento bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Inside Job Cocktail
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in an UB Koto Old Fashioned 30cl
ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe (omit for Cocktails Made Easy)']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: White Americano
garnish: Lemon zest twist & red currant string
ingredients: ['1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄3 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Brut Champagne']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.

name: Suzy & Peat
ingredients: ['1 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 2⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Tarragon sugar syrup (2:1)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Humdinger
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Ferrobaldi Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ferro China Baliva', '4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: Squeeze orange juice using pillar or elbow press and fine strain to remove any flesh. Then blend freshly squeezed juice at high speed (without ice) to make “fluffy”. Pour Ferro China and half the fluffy orange juice into glass over 2 cubes of ice and STIR. Fill glass with more ice (3 cubes) and rest of fluffy orange juice.

name: Magno Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '4 fresh Basil leaves']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over a chunk of block ice.

name: Bocado
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Palo cortado sherry', '3 drop *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
Method: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over a chunk of block ice.

Special ingredient #1: Rosemary oil (1:1 Rosemary stalks to a high-quality olive oil, left at room temperature for 24 hours.)

name: Wayfarer
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '2⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Rubino', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 drop La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "3 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Mr Dogma
garnish: Dehydrated lemon wheel, orange peel & edible flower
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Rubino', '1⁄3 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. (Didier’s original recipe uses 20ml pomegranate syrup which me makes with equal parts organic pomegranate juice & caster sugar.)

name: El Imigrante
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Simple sugar syrup (1 sugar to 1 water)']
steps: SWIZZLE all ingredients in glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Séquito
ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pana Pana
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Aguapanela (piloncillo juice) Mix 225g papelon, piloncillo, palm sugar, panela or dark muscovado sugar with 700ml boiled water until dissolved.

name: Robin Cocktail
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Pomegranate liqueur', '10 drop *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄12 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '2 drop Celery bitters']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Fish sauce

Special ingredient #2: Panden syrup

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over an ice ball.

name: The Royal Legacy
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '2 dash Plum bitters']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: *Martini Bianco infused with dates (15-17 dates per bottle. Cut dates in half and hand press. Add into liquid and infuse for 4 days.)

name: Back in Black
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄2 shot Simple sugar syrup (1 sugar to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

name: Herencia
