steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Henri’s original recipe calls for 10 ml Cinnamon syrup which he makes with 1 kg sugar, 1 litre water and 8 cinnamon sticks heated until sugar is dissolved then rested and strained.)

name: L'Aristocrate
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 spoon *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Special ingredient #1: Truffle salt

name: Amandita
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Verjuice', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2 dash Ricard Pastis', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda.

name: Semilla
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '5⁄6 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄4 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '4 dash Soy sauce']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Eternal Spirit
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '3 slice Cucumber (fresh)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hug From Mary
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Stout beer', '1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '4 dash Xocolatl mole bitters']
steps: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Back to Basics Cocktail
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Aquafaba (chickpea water)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Orange and red wine syrup - cube 1 orange, adding half the peel from a 2nd orange and soak in 300g sugar for up to 1.5 hours. Simmer with 330 ml red wine (Merlot) until the alcohol evaporates (around 10 mins).

name: Adelante
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 drop Worcestershire sauce', '6 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

name: Tales of Eight
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

name: Devil Woman
garnish: Hibiscus pickled onion (In a jar of pickled onions, add 50g of dried hibiscus flower to each litre of vinegar and infuse for 3 hours. Double strain vinegar to remove flowers and return to jar.)
ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot Lemon oleo saccharum', '1⁄6 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Cariño
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Greek yogurt', '2⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass over large ice cube. Eric's original recipe calls for 20ml vanilla syrup made with 1kg caster sugar, 500g water and 2 vanilla pods. (Vacuum seal all ingredients in a bag, with pods cut open. Sous vide at 65ºC until sugar is dissolved.)

name: La Familia No.2
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Green Apple Syrup', '1⁄3 shot Umeshu plum sake', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass rinsed with absinthe.

name: El Lingüista
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Branca Menta liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Equilibrium
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '3 dash *Special ingredient #3 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Coconut water syrup (1:1)

Special ingredient #2: Coconut yoghurt

Special ingredient #3: Eucalyptus essence

name: Golden Eight
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: 1300 Millas
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Banana (yellow) sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
steps:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

Special ingredient #1: Pineapple & clove syrup (1 litre hot water / 1 kg sugar / 5-6 smashed cloves / peeled pineapple in cubes)

name: Theobroma
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5⁄12 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', "1 dash Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)", "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass over a chunk of block ice. Gentle dash with bitters to create a layer.

name: Las Raices
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 spoon Balsamic vinegar of Modena', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Special ingredient #1: Vanilla brown sugar cane syrup (simmer 1:1 brown sugar cane and water. Add one vanilla pod cut in half, stir until sugar dissolves and cool).

name: Nostalgia
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Coconut water', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄6 shot Fino sherry', '5 dash Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Superhero
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Tiki mug or collins
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Mango purée', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled mug.

Special ingredient #1: Black banana puree

Special ingredient #2: Sweet & sour mix (2:1 lime & sugar)

name: Queen Street Cocktail
garnish: 2 spritzes Islay whisky on top of glass and 1 on side
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Simple sugar syrup (1 sugar to 1 water)', '3 dash Celery bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Poderoso
ingredients: ['1 wedge Lemon (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: Muddle lemon wedge in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Coki Beach
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Toasted coconut syrup (toast 720g of unsweetened coconut flakes on low heat until golden brown. Add 720ml water, bring to boil and remove from heat. Cover and steep for 25 minutes, strain and add equal parts sugar.)

name: North End Margarita
garnish: Lemon, thyme and pepper citrus salt rim (made by combining 2 tablespoons salt, ½ teaspoon dried thyme, and a twist of black pepper with the zest of half a lemon). Finish with thyme sprig pushed into cherry tomato.
ingredients: ['1 fresh Cherry tomato (fresh)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup']
steps: MUDDLE tomato in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with and fine strain into chilled rimmed glass.

name: Spicy Passion Fruit Margarita
garnish: Mint sprig, jalapeño slice & orange half-moon
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Spiced passion fruit syrup – made by dissolving 1000g Turbinado sugar in 500g of simmering water until dissolved. Add 200g jalapeño and keep on low heat to allow syrup to reduce for 15 minutes. Take off heat and allow to cool. Strain and add 750g passion fruit puree, stirring to combine. Store refrigerated one week.

name: LA Margarita
garnish: Chia seeds and salt (50/50 blend) rim, whole peeled lychee
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Ginger sugar syrup']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Lychee syrup – made by blending the contents of a can of lychees until completely liquefied and then fine straining.

name: Skyline Margarita
garnish: Cayenne-chile rim (4 parts kosher salt, 1 part chile powder & 1 part cayenne), & orange zest twist
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled cayenne-chile salt-rimmed glass.

Special ingredient #1: Blackberry shrub - combine equal parts blackberries, cane sugar and red wine vinegar in a blender, blend until liquefied, then strain out solids.

Special ingredient #2: Cayenne-chile syrup - combine 1 cup sugar, one cup water, 1 teaspoon chile powder, 1 teaspoon cayenne in a saucepan and bring to a simmer. Once desired flavour is achieved, strain out solids. Alternately, use .25 oz simple syrup, a slice of cayenne or other hot pepper, and a pinch of chile powder.

name: Mediterranean Margarita
garnish: Chamoy/Tajin rim (if available, use the Mexican condiment Chamoy to moisten the rim of glass, roll in Tajín to lightly coat. Alternately, use citrus juice and any chili-salt combo to create a similar effect.) Finish with a lime zest twist.
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Patron Citronge', '1 1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '1 spoon Orange marmalade']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled Chamoy/Tajín-rimmed glass.

name: Verde Margarita
garnish: Sugar, maldon salt & celery salt rim. Finish with celery spear & edible flower
ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Patron Citronge', '3⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 fresh Celery stick (fresh)', '1 pinch Salt']
steps: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and pour into glass.

name: Salted Plum Margarita
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '3⁄4 shot Umeshu plum sake', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Plum jam', '1 pinch Salt']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Fire & Brimstone
ingredients: ['2 slice Red jalapeño/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded & chopped (fine sliced)', '1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%) (infused with Earl Grey tea)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup']
steps: MUDDLE chillies in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: GDPR Cocktail
ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Apple Map
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Homemade apple cider syrup (2:1)', '1 dash Highland single malt scotch whisky', '2 dash Teapot bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Bee's Fizz
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Honey', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice). TOP with tonic water.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade sour mix (30ml / 1oz fresh lemon, 30ml / 1oz fresh lime, 30ml / 1oz orange blossom water & 1 fresh egg white)

name: Five 'n App
ingredients: ['1⁄2 spoon Fennel seeds', '1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "2 drop Difford's Saline Solution (or ½ pinch salt)"]
steps: MUDDLE fennel seeds in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pentagon
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄3 shot Highland single malt scotch whisky', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Egg white', '5⁄6 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled ice. TOP with soda.

Special ingredient #1: Lemon & honey mix (combine 15ml lemon juice, 5ml honey & 10ml / 1/3oz boiling water and stir until dissolved)

name: Highland Smash
ingredients: ['2 fresh Sage leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Heather honey']
steps: MUDDLE sage in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Dietrich's original recipe calls for 10 fresh micro sage leaves rather than the 2 regular sage leaves we’ve used.

name: Stonewall Jackson
ingredients: ['1 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot St. George Spiced Pear liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Cucumber sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube of block ice). Note: Bryson’s original recipe called for Uncouth Vermouth Apple Mint but as this is hard to obtain in Europe we substituted dry vermouth.

name: Snow White's Fizz
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Special ingredient #1: Red apple, cinnamon & roasted walnut shrub

name: Coul Blush Kelpie
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '1 1⁄3 shot Dandelion & Burdock']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with dandelion & burdock soda.

name: Dirk Swizzler
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Caorunn Gin', '3⁄4 shot Mead', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey water (1:1)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into glass 2/3 filled with crushed ice and SWIZZLE. Top with more crushed ice and swizzle to finish.

name: White Tales
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled cup or glass. 

Special ingredient #1: Sauvignon Blanc white wine (infused with oat meal left to soak over night)

name: The Balancing Act
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1 shot Tarragon sugar syrup (2:1)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Ubhal of my Eye
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Apple juice', '2⁄3 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Bob's Lavender Bitters"]
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Hébel
ingredients: ['4 fresh Blackberries', '1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Tawny port', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot Egg white']
steps: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Make me Blush
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bound by Herbs
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Bigallet China China Amer', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Spiced apple bitters']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Scottish Apple Snap
garnish: Candied ginger, lemon wheel & apple slices
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Homemade apple syrup (1:1)', '3 dash Spiced apple bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Snow White's Martini
ingredients: ['1 5⁄6 shot Caorunn Gin', '5⁄6 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Pernod anise', '2 dash Lemon bitters', '1 slice Lemon peel']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Highland Tonic
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Apple juice', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 shot Mediterranean tonic water']
steps:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice). TOP with tonic.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade sage syrup

name: Herbs & Spices
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Apple & Coriander cordial: take one apple (preferably Coul Blush, though Braeburn works just as well) and remove its core. Then take a handful of fresh coriander (roughly 40 grams) and dice finely. Throw both the diced apple and coriander into blender and purée until smooth the finely strain into a bowl. Measure the contents of the now-strained purée and add its equivalent in simple syrup (1:1).

name: Bucky Reviver
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Dry white port', '1 shot Italicus liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade seabuckthorn syrup: mix 300g fresh seabuckthorn and 200g white sugar in a pan, put on low heat until the fruits start to crack, chill and strain.

name: Running in the Highlands
ingredients: ['4 fresh Blackberries', '2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Lemon sherbet', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Rosé (infused with chamomille)', '4 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Golden Spritz
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Fino sherry', '1 shot Apple juice', '3⁄4 shot Homemade ginger juice syrup (1:1)', '2 shot Cava sparkling wine']
steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cava and briefly stir.

name: Strand 72
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Sour apple liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Summer Breeze
ingredients: ['1⁄6 whole *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 spoon Pomegranate seeds', '1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Heather honey']
steps:
MUDDLE pickled apple and pomegranate seeds in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Pickled red apple

name: By The Spey
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2 1⁄3 shot Coconut water', '1⁄12 shot Highland single malt scotch whisky', '1 1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄12 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
steps:
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade Apple-Shiso-Stevia Juice: 1000ml clear apple juice infused with 10 Shiso leaves & 15 dried Stevia leaves, heated in a pan for 10 minutes and then rested for 30 minutes before use.

name: Three Petals
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Lillet Rosé', '1 shot St. George Spiced Pear liqueur', '3 dash Rhubarb bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: The Remedy
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', "2⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄6 shot Rose water', '1⁄4 shot Citric acid solution (1tsp citric acid dissolved in 90ml water)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Ubhal 75
garnish: Apple slice around inside of rim
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '2 2⁄3 shot Dry cider']
steps:
STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with cider.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade apple cordial: 50ml apple syrup (e.g. Monin) and dissolve 5g malic acid in it.

name: Scotch Bonnet
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Ginger liqueur', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps:
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade spiced apple shrub

name: Runn Chamber No.9
garnish: Mint sprig, lemon peel and Dandelion & Burdock Bitters
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade sage apple syrup

name: The Coul Rose
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄6 shot Rose water', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 fresh Egg white']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade apple & rosemary shrub

name: Flat White
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '5 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄12 shot Simple sugar syrup (1 sugar to 1 water)', '1⁄6 shot Citric acid solution (1tsp citric acid dissolved in 90ml water)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Morningside
ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot Apple & cardamom shrub', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Kina aromatised wine']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Scottish Rifle
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '5⁄6 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Branca Menta liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Scotch ale beer']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with chilled ale.

name: Original Sin
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Highland single malt scotch whisky', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Ginger sugar syrup']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Calvilla AB Selezione apple liquor (or other suitable locally available high quality apple liqueur)

name: Snake Berry
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Honey', '1⁄4 fresh Red apple', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade blueberry & apple shrub: 200gr frozen blueberries, 200ml apple vinegar, 50gr fructose, boil in a pot, strain and bottle.

name: Pentapple Punch
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Amontillado sherry', '2 shot Pineapple shrub', '1 shot Apple juice', '4 fresh Basil leaves']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. (Make pineapple shrub with: fresh filtered pineapple extract, apple vinegar, simple syrup and ascorbic acid.)

name: Senza Parole
ingredients: ['2 1⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Liquore Strega', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade parsley syrup 2:1 (sciroppo al prezzemolo)

name: Pink Moon
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pamplemousse rose (pink grapefruit) syrup', "4 drop Bob's Lavender Bitters", '1⁄2 shot Egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Alchemist's Elixir
ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '5⁄12 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Piquant C
garnish: Crusta of dry powder of apple & cinnamon
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '1 dash Green hot pepper sauce']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Forager
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄3 shot St. George Spiced Pear liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 fresh Egg white']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without) ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade fig & apple chutney

name: Isabella's Restorative Dram
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Egg white']
steps:
Method: All ingredients added to a shaker and given a steady dry shake. Ice added when foam is achieved. Cold shaken and strained into a Nick & Nora glass. (Optionally, lightly smoke cocktail with wood chips using a chef’s smoker prior to shaking.)

Special ingredient #1: Cocchi Americano infused with Apple-Marjoram

name: Ginger Mary
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '5⁄6 shot Peach aperitif liqueur', '1 1⁄3 shot Carrot juice (freshly extracted)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice).

Special ingredient #1: Honey infused with orange peel and chilli

name: The Pentagon Sour
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Green apple & dill tincture

name: King Ka-roon
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 2⁄3 shot Apple juice', '1 1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Dandelion & Burdock Bitters']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade King Ka Mix (for 1 litre: 600ml fresh lemon juice, 400ml fresh orange juice, 25g egg white powder and 3 dash orange flower water.)

name: Thyme & Dandy
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 sprig Thyme sprig', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄2 shot Egg white', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Apple & dandelion shrub

name: Summer Orchard
ingredients: ['4 slice Red apple', '1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄3 shot Red wine vinegar', '1⁄3 shot Watermelon sugar syrup', 'Top up with Brut Champagne']
steps: MUDDLE apple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine stain into chilled glass. TOP with sparking wine.

name: The Balmenach
garnish: Drop Scottish summer harvest cold pressed rapeseed oil & coul blush apple fan garnish sprayed with Angostura Bitters mist.
ingredients: ['3 slice Red apple', '1 1⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Jägermeister']
steps: MUDDLE apple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Pink Evergreen Boost
garnish: Salt & brown sugar rim, garnish with rosemary sprig & pink grapefruit wedge.
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 Splash Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with soda.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade honey and rosemary syrup

name: Capitol Apple G&T
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps:
STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic.

Special ingredient #1: Ginger-infused apple juice

name: Essenziale
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Apple Cider vinegar', '1 spoon Pear preserve/jam']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)

name: Fifth Greal
garnish: Dehydrated apple cut around the 5 seedplaces.
ingredients: ['2 whole Green olives (pitted)', '1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄6 shot Simple sugar syrup (1 sugar to 1 water)']
steps:
MUDDLE olives in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Soft apple citric acid (70ml 100% apple juice, 30ml / 1oz filtered water, 7g of citric acid)

name: Five Inspirations
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade sour mix (50% sugar & 50 citrus)

name: Blythswood Square Punch
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey water (1:1)', '1⁄2 shot Homemade ginger juice syrup (1:1)', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Medium dry apple cider']
steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cider.

name: Ruby & Diamond
garnish: Red apple slices & lemon zest twist
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "5 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Special ingredient #1: Homemade saffron syrup (200ml water, 200g sugar and pinch saffron)

name: Touch Malum
ingredients: ['1⁄4 fresh Red apple', '1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄3 shot Drambuie liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
MUDDLE apple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Saffron syrup

name: Thyme Will Tell.
ingredients: ['2 fresh Thyme sprig', '2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 2⁄3 shot Apple juice', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade Saffron syrup (3 teaspoons saffron, 1kg white sugar, 1ltr water)

name: Mirage
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', 'Top up with *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass (no ice). TOP with apple cream soda from a siphon.

Special ingredient #1 Apple cream soda – add the following to a siphon:

45ml Egg white
10 slices caramalized green and red apples (caramalise with butter and brown sugar)
350ml Pressed apple juice
9 drops Vanilla bitters
Seal siphon and charge

name: Splifficated Beat
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Beetroot syrup', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 drop Black walnut bitters']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. (Originally, this cocktail was served in a tonic bottle in a brown paper bag for the drinker to pour themselves.)

name: The Scot & The Tiger
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Apple juice', '3⁄4 shot Yuzu juice', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over block ice).

Special ingredient #1: Lychee, lemongrass & sour plum infusion

name: Sona
garnish: Roasted bayleaf & dehydrated green apple slice
ingredients: ['2 sprig Coriander / cilantro leaves', '2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice', '1 shot Calamansi juice']
steps:
MUDDLE coriander in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade orange & cardamom sugar (1:1)

name: You Shrub Up Well!
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '5⁄6 shot Apple juice', '2⁄3 shot Aquafaba (chickpea water)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Brut Champagne']
steps:
Method: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade raspberry & burnt wildflower honey shrub

name: Red Blossom
garnish: Dehydrated green apple slice, star anise & rosemary sprig
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot Raspberry puree', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 1⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunck of block ice).

Special ingredient #1: Rosemary infused sugar syrup

name: Forager
ingredients: ['1 slice Red jalapeño/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded & chopped (fine sliced)', '1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
steps:
MUDDLE chilli in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade lemongrass syrup (1:1)

name: Orchard Breeze
ingredients: ['2 shot Caorunn Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '4 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '1 scoop *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and pour into glass.

Special ingredient #1: Honey crisp apple sorbet (or other flavour of sorbet)

name: Highland Blossom
ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Meletti amaro']
steps: Fill glass with ice, add single malt scotch and set aside. Separately, STIR other ingredients with ice. Discard ice and scotch from glass and fill with fresh ice (preferably one large cube of block ice). Strain stirred ingredients into glass.

name: The Royal Balkan
garnish: Orange zest twist & mist with scotch whisky
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 shot Montenegro amaro', '5⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "2 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
steps: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

name: Osmo Cup
garnish: Apple lollypop 4mm thich 2cm apple circle caramelised with sugar and torch and added popping sugar to one side & apple blossom (when available)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.


Special ingredient #1 *Osmose apple cordial shrub
Cut one apple very finely with a mandolin (do not shred otherwise you’ll end up with a very milky syrup). Add same weight of sugar, a pinch of black tea and dried rose petals. Ideally, vacuum seal for 24h or until the sugar dissolves or alternatively use a sealable glass jar. Strain into clean container and add same amount of apple cider vinegar and half of apple juice.

name: Highland Moor
garnish: Rosemary sprig & apple slice flambéed with brown sugar
ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1 1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
POUR green chartreuse into glass over rosemary sprig, ignite and allow to burn for 5 seconds before covering glass to extinguish. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-prepared glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade rosemary sugar syrup

name: Thyme for Nettles
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄3 shot Bigallet Thym', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade nettle syrup

name: Dopo la Tempesta
ingredients: ['1 cube Sugar cube', '1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄12 shot Muyu Chinotto Nero liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
steps: MUDDLE sugar cube with gin until dissolved. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Seonaidh
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Caorunn Gin', '2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Creme de Framboise', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lavender sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Angelo's Summer
garnish: Dehydrated red apple slice & lemon wheel crowned with edible flower
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Caorunn Gin', '1⁄2 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Orange & applewood smoked dulse syrup
Top make 250ml syrup:
5 grams Mara applewood and smoked dulse seaweed
1 full peeled orange
250ml Sugar syrup 1:1
Put all the ingredients in a sauce pan and for 15 minutes at low/medium heat.

SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling solution.

steps: POUR all ingredients into glass and briefly stir.

name: Black Daiquiri
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Doctor Pepper
ingredients: ['1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2 1⁄2 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer', '2 1⁄2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola & Pepsi Cola)']
steps: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

name: Electric Lemonade
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda and FLOAT blue curaçao on top of drink (this will sink and bleed through drink).

name: Jelly Bean Shot
ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Luxardo Sambuca', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Bloody Mary (no added sugar & low-calorie)
garnish: Spiked cocktail onion, cherry tomato and lemon wedge with celery stick stirrer (optional salt & pepper rim)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3 1⁄2 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '2 pinch Celery salt', '3 grind Black pepper', '10 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce (optional)']
steps: ROLL (rotate) all ingredients with ice in shaker (rather than shake) and strain into ice-filled glass. Use ice freshly from freezer to fill glass (not ice directly from ice-machine) to avoid unwanted dilution from melting ice.

name: Caipirinha (no added sugar & low-calorie)
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water', '1 1⁄2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and slice on half into 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add sweetener and MUDDLE.

3. If using cubed ice straight from the freezer, add chilled water (or optionally add fruit of your choice) and MUDDLE some more. If using watery ice then omit water.

4. When sure muddling has fully extracted fruit juice, POUR the muddled fruit and sweetener into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (the glass used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to mix with other ingredients.

6. If using cubed ice, crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

name: Cosmopolitan (no added sugar* & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Sugar-free sweetener']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (Be sure to use naturally sweetened cranberry drink rather than "juice" sweetened with sugar.)

name: Daiquiri (no added sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Espresso Martini (no sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1⁄2 pinch Salt']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Fitzgerald (no added sugar & low-calorie)

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Gimlet (no added sugar & low-calorie)
garnish: Express lime zest or two into glass and discard before pouring cocktail. Then place lime wedge on rim.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Gin Basil Smash (no added sugar & low-calorie)

steps: Gently MUDDLE basil in base of SHAKER with Gin. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Gin Sling (no added sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.

name: Long Island Iced Tea (no added sugar* & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola & Pepsi Cola)']
steps: SHAKE first 8 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola and briefly stir.

name: Margarita (no added sugar* & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1⁄2 pinch Salt']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Mint Julep (no sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into julep cup half filled with crushed ice. STIR the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top up the cup with more crushed ice and STIR again. Repeat this process so the drink fills the cup and frost forms on the outside.

name: Mojito (no added sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of glass. Add rum, lime juice and sugar free sweetener. Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more. TOP with soda, stir and serve with environmentally friendly straws.

name: New York Sour (no added sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)', '3⁄4 shot Claret red wine']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain ice-filled glass. DRIZZLE red wine around the surface of the drink.

name: Old Fashioned (no sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
steps: STIR bourbon with three ice cubes (dry to the touch well-frozen ice, not wet ice) in a glass. Add whiskey, sugar syrup, bitters and two more ice cubes. STIR some more and add another two ice cubes. And if you have room, add more ice before serving.

name: Passion Fruit Altern'atini (no added sugar & low-cal.)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
steps: Cut passion fruits in half and scoop out flesh into shaker (keep one half for garnish). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: Sazerac (no sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Sugar-free sweetener', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters (optional)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
steps: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and leave to stand. Separately THROW other ingredients with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and STRAIN drink into absinthe-coated glass.

name: Tom Collins (no added sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.

name: Vodka Collins (no added sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.

name: Vodka Sour (no added sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Whiskey Sour (no added sugar & low-calorie)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: White Lady (no added sugar* & low-calorie)

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

name: Naughty Charles
garnish: Lemon zest twist STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Nick & Nora glass
ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: Squeeze grapes to yield 20ml juice and SWIZZLE this with next 3 ingredients in glass half filled with crushed ice. Fill glass with more crushed ice and then FLOAT amaro.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine into chilled glass.

name: The Lemon Peel
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Liquore Strega', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

name: The Persuader
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine', '1⁄3 shot Muyu Chinotto Nero liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: The Ridgwell
ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '5⁄12 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '5⁄12 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Golden Hour Margarita
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
This drink can be shaken and served on the rocks or frozen. Rim a glass with a mixture of equal parts salt, turmeric and chilli pepper. SHAKE all ingredients or blend to combine. Pour into rimmed glass (filled with ice if you used a shaker).

Special ingredient #1: Tumeric agave syrup - 2 cups agave, 1 cup water, 2 tablespoons turmeric powder. Add agave, water and turmeric to a saucepan. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring frequently to incorporate the turmeric. Let cool and strain into a sealable bottle.

name: Dynasty Margarita
garnish: Grapefruit salt rim (mix 100g sea salt with 10g grated grapefruit peel, spread over a paper towel and leave to infuse and dry overnight)
ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄4 shot Patron Citronge', '1⁄4 shot St-Germain elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lychee syrup', '1⁄6 shot Ginger sugar syrup']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass pre-rimmed with grapefruit salt.

name: Flamingo Park Margarita
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter']
steps:
SHAKE spirits, agave syrup and lime juice with ice.
Rim a footed highball glass with the tajin/sea salt/black pepper mixture. Strain onto fresh ice in the glass. Top with grapefruit sparkling water and stir to combine.

Special ingredient #1: Grapefruit sparkling water.

Special ingredient #2: Tajîn/sea salt/black pepper rim - 2 parts tajin, 1 part Maldon sea salt, 1 part black pepper.

name: Margarita Amore
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Apple juice', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
steps:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Valentina-passionfruit syrup - combine two parts passionfruit syrup to one-part Valentina hot sauce and stir to combine. Store refrigerated.

name: Margarita Caliente
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '2 spoon Orange marmalade', '4 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)']

steps: MUDDLE apricot in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into cup half filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Special ingredient #1: Lemon sherbet
Peel 20 lemons. Juice the lemons, measure the liquid quantity and set aside. Measure 4 parts caster sugar for every 5 parts lemon juice and add to the lemon peels to leave overnight. In the morning, add the lemon juice and stir until the sugar is dissolved. Strain into a clean bottle and keep refrigerated.

Special ingredient #1: Passion fruit cinnamon syrup
Combine equal parts by weight passion fruit puree and white sugar. Mix until sugar is fully dissolved. Over medium heat combine equal parts by weight white sugar and water. Add 6 cinnamon sticks and heat until sugar is fully dissolved. Leave for 12 hours. Strain out cinnamon sticks. Combine 2 parts Cinnamon Syrup and 1 part Passion Fruit Syrup. Stir until fully incorporated.

name: Clarified Vodka Milk Punch
serving_suggestion:
Serve in an Old-fashioned glass
Photographed in a Libbey Old Fashioned 11oz
ingredients: ['6 2⁄3 shot Brewed cold black breakfast tea', '6 2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'fresh Lemon peel', '6 2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'fresh Orange peel', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '6 2⁄3 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']
steps:
Milk Punch Base pre-batch (scale-up recipe according to requirement)
1. POUR first 7 ingredients (with peels from the zests lemons & orange) into a sealable container and leave to infuse for 12 hours in a refrigerator.
2. Hot milk method HEAT milk until just starting to simmer and pour (while still simmering) into the container containing vodka tea and juice mix. The milk should curdle. Reseal and chill for at least 2-3 hours and up to 24 hours.
OR 2. Cold milk method POUR cold milk into the container containing vodka tea and juice mix. The milk should curdle. Reseal and chill for at least 2-3 hours and up to 24 hours.
3. Fine STRAIN mixture through cheesecloth or Superbag into a large jar or another container. Ideally, this should be in a refrigerator (I removed a shelf in ours) with the cheesecloth/bag hung over the jar.
4. Repeat step three, without removing curds from the filter or move to a finer strainer (e.g. from a 400-micron bag to a 100-micron bag) or coffee filter.
5. Stored in the refrigerator this will keep for a week (and potentially months) but be sure to sterilise containers etc.

Cocktail itself
STIR 50ml pre-prepared Milk Punch Base with 50ml vodka and 7.5ml sugar syrup and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)

name: Parasol

name: Three Dots and a Dash
garnish: 3 x blueberries and a long thin slice of pineapple on a stick to illustrate the name
serving_suggestion: Serve in a Tiki mug or collins
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martinique V.S.O.P rum', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
steps: FLASH-BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour into Tiki mug / pilsner glass. TOP with more crushed ice and serve with sustainable straws.

name: Strawberry Caipirinha
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Highball (max 10oz/300ml)
Photographed in a Libbey Highball 9oz
ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '3 fresh Small ripe strawberries (hulled)', '2 shot Novo Fogo Silver cachaça (from freezer)']
steps:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons powdered caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add strawberries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).

name: Oye Mi Canto (Hear My Song)

steps:
To make the tequila and tamarind infusion: Infuse 250 gram (9oz) of chopped tamarind flesh in 70cl/75cl blanco tequila for 2 days in a vacuum-sealed bag (or 2 weeks in a Kilner jar). Strain through a 100-micron Superbag and rebottle ready for use.

To make the cocktail: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Combustible Edison
serving_suggestion:

ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
steps: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Warm cognac in a metal ladle and ignite before pouring (from a height) as a flaming stream into the glass already containing other ingredients. PLEASE EXERCISE CAUTION!

name: Lemon Drop Crusta
garnish: Select a small wine or flute glass with a rim diameter that will snugly accommodate a small lemon tightly enough to act as a watertight extension to the glass. Cut off both ends of the fruit and carefully remove the pulp to leave a barrel-shaped shell of skin. Place in the top of the glass. Wet the edge of the glass and exposed fruit shell with sugar syrup and dip in caster sugar to frost the edge of both peel and glass. Leave for a couple of hours to form a hard crust.
ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2 dash Lemon bitters']

steps: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with beer and ginger beer and briefly stir.

name: Bird of Paradise Gin Fizz
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Highball (max 10oz/300ml)
Photographed in a Libbey Levitas 6.75oz
ingredients: ['2 shot Portobello Old Tom gin', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '3 drop Orange flower/blossom water', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and slowly pour 2/3rds of the contents of the shaker from a higher than normal height into a chilled empty glass (no ice in glass) while simultaneously pouring soda with your other hand. The cocktail and soda should form a single stream of liquid falling into the glass.

As when pouring a Guinness, to achieve a perfect head on a fizz, the cocktail should be left to settle for at least a minute before topping off with what remains in the shaker. Ideally, during the settling period, the glass should be placed in a glass froster/fridge/freezer. As the final contents of the shaker are poured into the glass so the head should rise like a souffle.

steps: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

name: Poinciana
ingredients: ['4 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
steps: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: De Rigueur
serving_suggestion:
Serve in a Coupe glass

ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']

ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Vermouth amaro (e.g. Cardamaro)', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
steps: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Serve in a Coupe glass

name: Ramos Greek Fizz
ingredients: ['2 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white', '2 spoon Greek yogurt', '3 1⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
steps: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled (empty) glass, while at the same time pouring soda water with your other hand so both liquids form a single stream to slowly fill the glass.
